Abaffe, mulowooza nti twakoowa olw’okutonda okwasooka? Nedda, bo bali mu kutabukatabuka ku ntonda empya.
Mazima Ffe twatonda omuntu era tumanyi bulungi ebyo omwoyo gwe bye gumupikirizaamu, era Ffe tuli okumpi ennyo naye n’okusinga omusuwa ogw’obulamu.
Awo ba malayika ababiri abawandiisi bwe bawandiika ebikolwa nga batudde, omu nga ali ku ddyo n’omulala ku kkono,
Omuntu tayogera kigambo kyonna, wabula w’ali wabaawo omulabirizi ali obulindaala okukiwandiika.
Era okutaawa kw’okufa ddala kwa kujja, omuntu ategezebwe nti: Ekyo nno kye wali ogezaako okwewala.
Era eng’ombe erifuuyibwa nti: Luno nno lwe lunaku olwalagaanyizibwa.
Era buli muntu alijja nga aliko malayika omugobi ne malayika omujulizi.
Aligambibwa nti: Mazima wali tofaayo ku kino, naye kati tukuggyeeko ekibikka kyo, kale okulaba kwo olwa leero kwekansa.
Era munneewe aligamba nti: Ekiwandiiko kye kiikino kiri bulindaala wendi.
Ba malayika baligambibwa nti: Mwembi musuule mu muliro buli mutakkiriza, omulabe w’amazima,
Omuziyiza w’ebirungi, abuuka ensalo, abuusaabuusa,
Oyo eyassawo katonda omulala awamu ne Allah. Kale mwembi mumusuule mu kibonerezo ekikakali.
Munneewe aligamba nti: Mukama waffe, si nze namujeemya, wabula ye yennyini y’eyali mu kubula okw’ewala.
Allah Aligamba nti: Temutotooganira mu maaso gange ate nga nawa dda okulabula kwange gye muli olubereberye.
Teri nsala eva gyendi ekyuusibwa era nze siryazaamaanya baweereza.
Ku lunaku olwo tuligamba omuliro nti: Owange, ojjudde? Era guliddamu nti: Abaffe, eriyo ennyongeza?
Era n’e Janna erisembezebwa eri abatya Allah n’etaba wala.
Baligambibwa nti: Eno y’e Janna gye mwasuubizibwa, mmwe n’eri buli eyadding’ananga ennyo eri Allah, nga mwekuumi,
Oyo eyatyanga Allah Omusaasizi ennyo mu kyaama era n’ajja gy’ali n’omutima omwenenyi.
Mugiyingire mirembe. Luno lwe lunaku olw’olubeerera.
Balifuniramu buli kye balyagaliramu, ate nga n’ennyongeza tugirina.
Ye emirembe emeka gye twazikiriza olubereberye lwabwe abaali babasinza amaanyi! Kale ekibonerezo bwe kyajja, baabuna emiwabo mu nsi. Abaffe, waaliwo obuwonero?
Mazima mw’ekyo mulimu okubuulirira eri oyo alina omutima, oba atega amatu era nga assaayo omwoyo.
Era mazima twatonda eggulu n’ensi n’ebiri wakati wa byombi mu biseera mukaaga, naye tetwatuukwako bukoowu bwonna.
Kale ggwe gumiikiriza kw’ebyo bye boogera era otendereze n’amatendo ga Mukama wo, nga enjuba tennavaayo n’awo nga tennagwa.
Era mutenderezenga ne mu kiro, n’oluvannyuma lw’okuvuunama mu swala.
Era wuliriza! Olunaku omukoowozi lw’alikowoola nga ayima mu kifo eky’okumpi,
Olwo lwe lunaku lwe baliwulira olubwatuka olw’amazima, olwo nno lwe lunaku lw’okuva mu ntaana.
Mazima Ffe tuwa obulamu era Ffe tufiisa era gye tuli y’eri obuddo.
Olunaku ensi lw’eribaabikako balijja buteesagga. Okwo nno kwe kukung’aanya okwangu ennyo gye tuli.
Ffe tumanyi bulungi ebyo bye boogera, era ggwe toli mukasi ku bo. Kale buulirira ne Kur’āni oyo atya okulabula kwange.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Njuliza ebyo ebisaasaanya olusaasaanya,
Era njuliza n’ebyo ebyetikka ebizito,
N’ebyo ebidduka ekimpoowooze,
N’oluvannyuma njuliza n’ebigabanya olw’ekiragiro,
Mazima ddala ebyo bye musuubizibwa bya mazima;
Era ddala okulamula, mazima kwa kubaawo.
Era njuliza obwengula obujjude amakubo,
Mazima ddala muli ku kigambo ekitatabagana.
Awugulwa ku mazima y’oyo asaanye okuwugulwa.
Abalimba bakolimirwe!
Abo abali mu butamanya obw’ewala, abatafaayo.
Beebuuza nti: Olunaku lw’Okulamula lulibaawo ddi?
Bagambe nti: Lwe lunaku lwe balibonerezebwa mu muliro.
Baligambibwa nti: Muloze ku kibonerezo ky’enkwe zammwe. Kino nno kye mwali muwujjirira.
Mazima abatya Allah be baliba mu nsuku n’ensulo,
Nga beefunira ebyo Mukama waabwe bye yabawa. Mazima bo n’olubereberye lw’ekyo baali bakozi ba birungi.
Baalinga beebaka katono ekiro.
Era nga basaba n’okusonyiyibwa mu matulutulu,
Era nga ne mu by’obugagga bwabwe mulimu omutemwa omukakafu olw’oyo asaba n’oyo atasobola kusaba.
Era mu nsi mulimu obubonero eri abo abalina obukakafu,
Ne mu mmwe bennyini. Abaffe, temulaba?
Era mu ggulu y’eri ebigabibwa byammwe n’ebyo bye musuubizibwa.
Kale mu mazima g’Omutonzi w’eggulu n’ensi, Kur’āni ddala ntuufu nga bwe kiri ekituufu nti nammwe mwogera.
Abaffe, watuukwako ebyafa ku bagenyi ba Ibrāhīmu ab’ekitiibwa?
Awo bwe baayingira gy’ali, kale baagamba nti: Mirembe! Naddamu nti: Mirembe! Anti bonna baali bantu bagwiira.
Kale yeemulula n’agenda eri ab’omu maka ge, n’aleeta ennyama y’ennyana ensava enjoyke.
N’agibasembereza, n’agamba nti: Abaffe, temuulyeko?
Olwo yawulira muli nga abatidde. Ne bagamba nti: Totya. Olwo nebamuwa amawulire ag’essanyu ag’omwana ow’obulenzi alina obumanyi.
Olwo ne mukyala we yasembera ng’eno bw’akungiriza nga bwe yeekuba mu maaso ge, n’agamba nti: Nze omukadde, omugumba!
Baddamu nti: Bw’atyo Mukama wo bw’agambye. Ddala Ye ye Mugezi ennyo, Omumanyi wa byonna.
Ibrāhīmu n’agamba nti: Ddala mujjiridde nsonga ki, abange mmwe abatumiddwa?
Nebaddamu nti: Ddala tutumiddwa eri abantu aboononyi,
Tulyooke tubasuuleko oluyinjayinja,
Olulambiddwako okuva eri Mukama wo olw’abasusse mu bubi.
Kale twaggyamu abakkiriza abaakirimu,
Naye tetwakisangamu, okuggyako enju emu yokka ey’Abasiraamu.
Era twakirekamu eky’okulabirako ku lw’abo abatya ekibonerezo ekirumya.
Era ne mu byafa ku Mūsa mwalimu eky’okuyiga. Awo bwe twamutuma eri Farāwo n’obukakafu obw’olwaatu.
Kale Farāwo n’akubayo mabega n’abakungu be n’agamba nti: Mulogo oba mulalu.
Kale twamubonereza n’amagye ge netubasuula mu nyanja nga ye y’aneyezebwa.
Era n’ebyafa ku ba ‘Ādi mulimu eky’okulabirako. Awo bwe twabasindikira kibuyaga azikiriza,
Ataataliza kintu kyonna kye yatuukako, wabula yakifuula ng’eggumba erimerengufu.
Era ne mu byafa ku ba Thamūda byalimu eky’okulabirako. Awo bwe baagambibwa nti: Mweyagalemu okumala akaseera.
Kale nebajeemera ekiragiro kya Mukama waabwe, olwo okubwatuka ne kubakangavvula nga nabo balaba.
Kale tebaasobola kusituka wadde tebeerwanako.
Era twazikiriza n’abantu ba Nūhu olubereberye lwa bano. Ddala nabo baali bantu bajeemu.
Era n’eggulu Ffe twalikola n’amaanyi era ddala tukyaligaziya.
Era n’ensi Ffe twagyaliira, ye nga tuli baalirizi balungi nnyo!
Era mu buli kimu twakolamu omugogo gw’ekisajja n’ekikazi, mulyooke mufumiitirize.
Kale muddukire eri Allah. Mazima nze Mulabuzi wammwe ow’olwaatu ava gy’ali.
Era temuteekangawo musinzibwa mulala awamu ne Allah. Mazima nze Mulabuzi wammwe ow’olwaatu ava gy’ali.
Bwe kityo era n’abaabasooka tebaatuukibwangako Mubaka yenna, wabula baagambanga nti: Mulogo oba mulalu.
Abaffe, baakuutiragana ku kyo? Nedda, wabula bo bantu bajeemu.
Kale ggwe baleke, kuba si ggwe onenyezebwa.
Naye buulirira, kuba ddala okubuulirira kugasa nnyo abakkiriza.
Era saatonda Majinni na bantu wabula lwa kunsinza.
Nze seetaaga kuweebwa kya kulya kyonna okuva gye bali, wadde seetaaga bo kundiisa.
Mazima Allah ye Ssaabagabi, Nannyini buyinza, Ow’amaanyi ennyo.
Naye ddala abo aboononyi balina omutemwa ogufaananira ddala n’omutemwa gwa bannaabwe eb’edda, kale baleme kumbuguutanya.
Kale zibasanze abo abatakkiriza, olw’olunaku lwabwe olwo lwe baasuubizibwa!
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Njuliza olusozi Ṭūr,
N’Ekitabo ekyawandiikibwa
Ku bipande ebyanjuluze,
N’Ennyumba etabeerera awo,
N’akasolya akawanike,
N’ennyanja efuukuuse,
Mazima ekibonerezo kya Mukama wo ddala kya kubaawo;
Tewali ayinza kukiziyiza.
Olunaku eggulu lwe lirisambattuka olusambattuka olw’amaanyi,
N’agasozi galitambula olutambula,
Kale kw’olwo abaalimbisa ziribasanga,
Abo abaalinga mu kubalaata nga beezannyira.
Olunaku lwe balisindikibwa mu muliro olusindika,
Baligambibwa nti: Guno gwe muliro gwe mwalimbisanga.
Abaffe, era kuno kubuzaabuza oba era mmwe temulaba?
Kale muguyingire. Bwe munaagumiikiriza oba bwe mutaagumiikirize, ky’ekimu gye muli. Mazima musasulwa lw’ebyo bye mwakolanga.
Mazima abatya Allah be baliba mu Janna n’amasanyu amajjuvu,
Nga beeyagalira mw’ebyo Mukama waabwe by’abawadde, era Mukama waabwe alibawonya ekibonerezo ky’omuliro.
Baligambibwa nti: Mulye era munywe n’essanyu nga y’empeera y’ebyo bye mwakolanga,
Nga bagalaamidde ku ntebe empunde ezitegekeddwa mu nnyiriri. Era tulibafumbiza abakyala amakula ab’amaaso ag’endege.

Naye abo abakkiriza n’ezzadde lyabwe nelibagoberera mu bukkiriza, naffe tulibasisinkanya n’ezzadde lyabwe. Era tetulikendeeza kantu konna ku bikolwa byabwe. Buli muntu y’aliba omusingo gw’ebyo bye yakolanga.
Era tulibongera ebibala n’ennyama eya buli ngeri mw’ebyo bye balyagalanga.
Baliweerezaganya ekikopo ky’ekyokunywa ekitaleeta bya swakaba wadde okwonoona.
Era balyetooloolwamu abavubuka baabwe, abalibanga luulu enkusike.
Era baliyolekagana bokka na bokka nga beewuunaganya.
Nga bwe bagamba nti: Ddala olubereberye bwe twabanga mu baffe twatyanga nnyo Allah okutusunguwalira.
Kale ne Allah n’aba wa kisa gye tuli n’atuwonya ekibonerezo ky’olubabu.
Mazima n’olubereberye, ffe Ye gwe twalaajaniranga. Ddala Ye ye Mulungi ennyo, ow’ekisa ekingi.
Kale buulirira. Kuba olw’okusaasira kwa Mukama wo, toli mulaguzi wadde toli mugwi wa ddalu.
Kazzi bagamba nti: Muyiiya wa bitontome, tumulindiriza kiseera eky’akabi?
Gamba nti: Kale mulindirire! Nange ndi wamu nammwe mu balindirira.
Abaffe, amagezi gaabwe ge gabalagira kino oba bo bantu bajeemu bujeemu?
Nandiki, bagamba nti: Kur’āni y’eyagiyiiya? Ddala bo si ba kukkiriza.
Kale nabo baleeteyo ekigambo ekiringa kino, obanga boogera mazima.
Nandiki, baatondebwa lwa bweerere oba bo be batonzi?
Nandiki be baatonda eggulu n’ensi? Nedda, tebalina bukakafu.
Abaffe, bo be balina amawanika ga Mukama wo, oba bo be balabirizi ba go?
Nandiki, balinawo amadaala ge bawuliririzaako ebifa mu ggulu? Kale omuwuliriza waabwe aleete obukakafu obw’olwaatu.
Abaffe, Ye y’alina abaana abawala, mmwe nemuba n’abalenzi?
Nandiki obasabye empeera nti bazitoowererwa bbanja?
Oba balina okumanya kw’ebyenkiso nti kati bo bye bawandiika?
Nandiki, baagala kwekoba? Anti era abatakkiriza okwekoba kwabwe ate kuddira bo.
Abaffe, balinayo katonda omulala atali Allah? Omutuukirivu ye Allah ali waggulu ennyo n’ebyo bye benkanya naye!
Era bwe balaba ekibajjo ekiva waggulu nga kigwa, bagamba nti: Ebire by’enkuba binaatera okwetuuma.
Kale ggwe baleke okutuusa lwe balisisinkana n’olunaku lwabwe olwo lwe balikubirwamu eraddu,
Olunaku okwekoba kwabwe lwe kutaligasa n’akatono, wadde tebaliyambibwa.
Era ddala abo abakola ebibi, balinayo n’ekibonerezo ekirala ebbali w’ekyo. Naye abasinga obungi mu bo tebamanyi.
Kale lindirira okusalawo kwa Mukama wo, mazima gwe oli mu bulabirizi bwaffe; era tendereza nnyo n’amatendo ga Mukama wo buli lw’ogolokoka,
Era ne mu kitundu ekimu eky’ekiro mutenderezenga nnyo, n’awo emmunyeenye we zigwiira.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Njuliza emmunyeenye awo nga egwa,
Munnamme tabulanga wadde tawabanga,
Era tayogera lwa kweyagalira.
Ebyo si kirala wabula kwe kubikkulirwa okubikkulwa Allah.
Ow’amaanyi amasukkirivu y’amuyigiriza,
Nannyini maanyi ag’ensusso. Bw’atyo eyatebenkera ku Nnamulondo ye.
Era y’eyamubikkulira nga ali ekkuzimu esingira ddala obutumbiivu.
N’oluvannyuma yasembera nnyo eri Allah, olwo ate n’akkirira eri ebitonde,
Kale n’aba ng’akagwa akali ku mitego gy’obusaale ebiri, oba okumpi ennyo okusingawo.
Olwo n’abikkulira Omuweereza we ebyo bye yabikkula.
Omwoyo gwa Mutume tegwalimbamu kw’ebyo bye yalaba.
Abaffe, era munaamuwakanya kw’ebyo bye yalaba?
Era ddala yamulaba ne mu kukka okulala,
Okumpi n’omuti gwa Sidiri ogukomererayo.
Okumpi na gwo we wali Janna y’amaka ag’olubeerera.
Ekyo kyaliwo awo ng’ekisaanikira Sidiri kigisaanikidde.
Eriiso teryawubwa wadde teryalabankana.
Mazima yalabira ddala obubonero bwa Mukama we obusingira ddala obukulu.
Abaffe, mubalabye: Lāti* ne ‘Uzza?*
N’omulala Manāti* owokusatu?
Abaffe, mmwe mulina ab’obulenzi, Ye alina ba buwala?
Mazima okwo nno kugabanya kwa kiryazaamaanyi!

Ago si kirala wabula mannya bunnya ge mwatuuma mmwe ne bakitammwe. Allah tagassangako bukakafu bwonna. Tebagoberera kirala wabula kuteebereza, n’ebyo emyoyo gyabwe bye gyagala; so nga ddala baatuukibwako obulung’amu obwava eri Mukama waabwe.
Abaffe, omuntu ayinza okufuna buli kye yeegomba?
Kale eby’enkomerero n’eby’oku nsi bya Allah.
Ye ba malayika bameka abali mu ggulu naye nga okuwolereza kwabwe tekugasa n’akatono, wabula luvannyuma nga Allah amaze kukkiriza oyo gw’aba ayagadde era ng’asiimye?
Mazima abo abatakkiriza nkomerero ddala be batuuma ba malayika amannya g’ekikazi,
So nga ekyo tebalina kye bakimanyiiko. Tebagoberera kirala wabula okuteebzeka; naye ddala okuteeb eeka tekugasa n’akatono awali amazima.
Kale leka oyo akuba amabega eri Okubuulirira kwaffe era atanoonya kirala okuggyako obulamu bw’ensi.
Awo bo we bakoma mu kumanya. Mazima Mukama wo y’asinga okumanya oyo abuze ku kkubo lye era y’asinga okumanya oyo agoberera obulung’amu.
Era byonna ebiri mu ggulu n’ebiri mu nsi bya Allah, n’ekivaamu asasula abaayonoona okusinziira ku bye baakola; n’asasula n’abo abakola ebirungi ng’abasasula ebyo ebisingira ddala obulungi.

Abo abeewalira ddala ebibi ebinene n’ebyambyoone — okuggyako obusobyosobyo obuyitira — mazima Mukama wo ye Nannyini kusonyiwa okugazi. Ye mmwe y’asinga okubategeera okuviira ddala awo we yabatondera mu nsi era n’awo nga mukyali ttutumba mu mbuto za bannyammwe. Kale nno temwetukuzatukuzanga, Ye y’asinga okumanya oyo atya Allah.
Abaffe, omulabye oyo akubayo amabega,
N’atoola katono, n’akodowala?
Abaffe, alinayo okumanya kw’ebyenkiso, bw’atyo asobola okulaba ebijja?
Abaffe, teyategeezebwa kw’ebyo ebiri mu biwandiiko bya Mūsa
Ne Ibrāhīmu oyo eyatuukiriza endagaano?
Nti tewali mwetissi yenna alyetikka buzito bwa mulala;
Era nti omuntu talifuna kyonna okuggyako ekyo ky’atakabanidde;
Era nti ddala okufuba kwe mangu nnyo kujja kulabwa;
N’oluvannyuma alisasulwa empeera enzijuvu;
Era ddala eri Mukama wo y’eri enkomerero ya buli kimu;
Era nti ddala Ye y’asesa era y’akaabya;
Era nti ddala Ye y’afiisa era y’awa obulamu;
Era nti ddala Ye y’eyatonda ebibiri ebibiri, ekisajja n’ekikazi,
Okuva mu ttondo ly’amazzi agazaala awo nga liyiibbwa;
Era nti ddala n’okutonda kw’oluvannyuma kuli ku Ye;
Era nti ddala Ye y’agaggawaza era y’amatiza;
Era nti ddala Ye Mukama w’emmunyeenye Shi’rā;
Era nti ddala y’eyazikiriza aba ‘Ādi abaasooka,
N’aba Thamūda teyalekawo n’omu,
N’abantu ba Nūhu olubereberye — ddala bo baali boonoonefu nnyo, nga bajeemu nnyo —
N’ebibuga ebyavuunikibwa y’eyabisuula,
Kale nekibisaanikira ekyo ekyabisaanikira.
Kale ate kiki ky’owakanya ku byengera bya Mukama wo?
Ono ye Mulabuzi ali mu Balabuzi ab’olubereberye.
Essaawa ey’okusembera esembedde.
Teriiko ayinza kugiggyawo okuggyako Allah.
Abaffe, ekigambo kino kye mwewuunya?
Nemuseka busesi, nemutakaaba?
Era ne mutafa nayo?
Kale muvuunamire Allah era gwe mubanga musinza.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Essaawa esembedde, n’omwezi gwabiseemu.
Naye bo bwe balaba akabonero, bakubayo mabega nebagamba nti: Bulogo bwa lutentezi.
Nebalimbisa era nebagoberera okwagala kwabwe. Naye buli kiragiro kiba n’ekiseera ekigere.
Era ddala baatuukibwako amawulire ama kulu ago agalimu okulabula —
Nga magezi majjuvu, naye okulabula tekugasa gye bali.
Kale ggwe baleke okutuusa olunaku Omukoowozi lw’alikowoola abantu eri ekintu ekitakkirizika,
Amaaso gaabwe galitunula wansi. Baliva mu ntaana nga balinga enzige ezisaasaanye,
Nga beeyuna eri Omukoowozi. Abatakkiriza baligamba nti: Luno lunaku lukakanyavu.
Abantu ba Nūhu abaabakulembera baalimbisa obubaka era nebalimbisa n’Omuwereza waffe, nebagamba nti mulalu era alumiddwa ba lubaale.
Kale yasaba Mukama we nti: Ddala nze mpanguddwa, naye yamba!
Kale netuggulawo enzigi z’ebire n’amazzi agafukumuka;
Era netuvuuguula ensulo mu nsi, amazzi negasisinkana olw’ensonga eyali emaze okugerekebwa.
Era Nūhu netumusitulira mu kyombo eky’embaawo n’emisumaali,
Nga kiseeyeeya na kulabirira kwaffe, nga y’empeera y’oyo eyagaanibwa.
Era mazima ekikolwa ekyo twakirekawo ng’akabonero; naye abaffe, waliwo ku yenna alabuka?
Naye ekibonerezo kyange n’okulabula kwange byali bitya?
Era ddala twafuula Kur’āni ennyangu okujjukirwa n’okutegeera. Naye abaffe, waliwo ku yenna afumiitiriza?
Aba ‘Ādi baalimbisa Omubaka. Naye ekibonerezo kyange n’okulabula kwange byali bitya?
Mazima twabasindikira kibuyaga ow’essungu ku lunaku olw’ekikwa eky’olutentezi,
Ng’asikambula abantu nebagwa eri nebaba ng’ebikolo by’emitende egikuuliddwa.
Naye ekibonerezo kyange n’okulabula kwange byali bitya?
Era ddala Kur’āni twagifuula ennyangu okukwata n’okutegeera. Naye abaffe, waliwo ku yenna anaagikwata ku mwoyo?
Aba Thamūda nabo baalimbisa Abalabuzi.
Ne bagamba nti: Abaffe, omuntu omu ati mu ffe gwe tuba tugoberera? Mazima olwo naffe tunaaba tuli mu bubuze na bulogovvu.
Era ye y’assibwako Okubuulirira mu ffe fenna? Nedda, oyo mulimba, mwepansi!
Enkya bajja kumanya ani mulimba omwepansi!
Mazima tujja kuweereza eng’amira enkazi nga kigezo gye bali. Kale ggwe basseeko abiri era ogumiikirize.
Era bategeeze nti ddala amazzi ga kugabanyizibwa wakati waabwe naye nga buli kiseera ky’okunywa kikuumwa.
Naye baakoowoola munnaabwe, n’asinziira n’agitemako amagulu.
Naye ekibonerezo kyange n’okulabula kwange byali bitya?
Mazima twabasindikira olubwatuka lumu, nebaba ng’omuddo omukalu, ogulinyiriddwa.
Era ddala Kur’āni twagifuula ennyangu okujjukira n’okutegeera. Naye abaffe, waliwo ku yenna afumiitiriza?
N’abantu ba Lūti baalimbisa abalabuzi.
Mazima twabasindikira omuyaga gw’oluyinjayinja, okuggyako ab’omu maka ga Lūti; bo twabawonya nga bunaatera okukya,
Nga gwe mukisa oguva gye tuli. Bwe tutyo nno bwe tusasula oyo eyeebaza.
Era ddala yalabula ku kibonerezo kyaffe, naye nebabuusabuusa okulabula.
Era ddala baagezaako okumuggya ku bagenyi be, kale netuziba amaaso gaabwe, netugamba nti: Kale muloze ku kibonerezo kyange n’okulabula kwange.
Era ddala ekibonerezo eky’olutentezi kyabatuukako ku maliiri.
Kale muloze ku kibonerezo kyange n’okulabula kwange.
Era ddala Kur’āni twagifuula ennyangu okujjukirwa n’okukwata. Naye abaffe, waliwo ku yenna anaalabuka?
Era ddala abantu ba Farāwo nabo baatuukibwako Abalabuzi.
Baalimbisa obubonero bwaffe bwonna, kale netubakangavvula enkangavvula eya Kirimaanyi, Nannyini buyinza.
Abaffe, abatakkiriza abammwe be basinga kw’abo? Nandiki mulinawo obuwonero obwawandiikibwa mu Bitabo?
Kazzi bagamba nti: Ffe kibiina ekiwanguzi?
Naye mangu nnyo eggye lyabwe lijja kuwangulwa balage n’enkoona.
Ddala Essaawa kwe kusuubizibwa kwabwe, naye Essaawa ya kabenje nnyo era nkaawu nnyo.
Mazima aboonoonyi bali mu kubula na kuzoola.
Olunaku lwe baliwalulirwa ku bwenyi bwabwe mu muliro baligambibwa nti: Muloze ku kukoonwako kw’omuliro.
Mazima buli kimu twakitonda mu kigero ekisaanidde.
Era ekiragiro kyaffe kiba ekigambo kimu ng’okutemya kw’eriiso.
Era ddala abaali bafaanana nga mmwe twabazikiriza. Abaffe, waliwo ku yenna afumiitiriza?
Era buli kimu kye baakola kiri mu Bitabo.
Era buli kitono n’ekinene kiwandiikibwa.
Mazima abatya Allah be baliba mu Janna n’emigga,
Mu butuulo obw’amazima awali Kabaka Ow’obuyinza.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo
Y’eyayigiriza Kur’āni.
Yatonda omuntu.
N’amuyigiriza ennyinnyonnyola ennambulukufu.
Enjuba n’omwezi bitambulira ku kubalirira.
Era ebimera n’emiti biwulize gy’ali.
N’eggulu y’eyaliwanika era n’assaawo ekipima buli kimu.
Kale temukyamyanga mu kupima.
Era mutereezenga okupima mu bwenkanya ate temukendeezanga ku kipimo.
Era n’ensi y’eyagissaawo olw’ebitonde byonna;
Ng’erimu ebibala ebya buli ngeri n’emitende egirina eng’o,
N’ebimera eby’empeke eziriko ebikuta n’ebyakawoowo.
Kale mwembi, abantu n’Amajinni, kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Yatonda omuntu mu budongo obukalu obudoodooma obuling’anga ekibumbe ekyookye.
Era n’atonda Amajinni mu nnimi z’omuliro.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Mukama w’ebugwanjuba wombi era Mukama w’ebuvanjuba wombi.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Y’akulukusa ennyanja ebbiri, lumu ezirisisinkana.
Kati wakati wa zombi waliwo ekiziyiza kye zitayinza kubuuka.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Mu nnyanja ezo zombi muvaamu luulu ne marijaani.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
N’ebyombo ebigulumidde ku nnyanja ng’agasozi bibye.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Buli ekiri ku yo (ensi) kya kuggwawo.
Olwo wasigalewo Mukama wo yekka Kabwejungira Ow’entiisa n’Ekitiibwa.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana mu byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Ebiri mu ggulu ne mu nsi byonna bisaba Ye yekka. Buli kiseera Ye aba ku ttendo lya njawulo.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Mangu tujja kuboolekera, abange mmwe ba kirimaanyi ababiri.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Abange mmwe ebibiina by’Amajinni n’abantu, obanga musobola okuyisa ensalo z’eggulu n’ensi, kale muyitewo. Naye temuyinza kuyitawo wabula lwa buyinza bwe.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Mwembi mujja kuweerezebwa ennimi z’omuliro ezitaleeta mukka, n’ekikomo ekisaanuuse, ate temujja kuyambagana.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Kale eggulu bwe liryabika, olwo liriba limyuufu ng’eddiba erimyuufu.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Kale kw’olwo omuntu wadde ejjinni tewaliba abuuzibwa ku kibi kye.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Aboonoonyi balimanyibwa olw’obulambe bwabwe, kale balikwatibwa mu nviiri zoomu kawompo ne ku bigere.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byegera bya Mukama wammwe?
Guno gwe muliro ogwo aboonoonyi gwe baalimbisanga.
Balyetooloolera wakati wa gwo ne wakati w’olweje olwesera.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Naye oyo atya embuga ya Mukama we alifuna e Janna bbiri.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana mu byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Nga zombi zirimu emiti gy’amatabi amangi.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Nga mu zombi mulimu ensulo bbiri ezikulukuta.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Mu zombi nga mulimu buli kibala nga kya ngeri bbiri bbiri.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Nga bagalaamiridde ku biwempe nga munda wa byo mulimu liiri omuzito, n’ebibala eby’e Janna zombi nga biri kumpi nnyo.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Nga mu zombi mulimu abakazi abakkakkamu b’amaaso, abutakoonebwangako olubereberye lwabwe muntu yenna wadde ejjinni.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Abaling’anga yaakuuti ne marijaani.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Abaffe, empeera y’obulungi eyinza okuba ekirala okuggyako obulungi?
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Era n’ebbali w’e Janna zombi nga eriyo Janna endala bbiri.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Zombi nga zirimu ebikoola ebya kiragala omukwaafu.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Mu zombi nga mulimu ensulo bbiri ezitiiriika ennyo.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Mu zombi nga mulimu ebibala ebya buli ngeri, n’entende n’enkomamawanga.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Mu zombi nga mulimu abakazi bannalulungi ab’empisa ennungi —
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Abakazi amakula abalabirirwa mu weema —
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Abatakoonebwangako muntu yenna olubereberye lwabwe wadde ejjinni —
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Nga bagalaamiridde ku mitto egya kiragala n’ebiwempe amakula.
Kale mwembi kiki kye munaagaana ku byengera bya Mukama wammwe?
Lya mikisa nnyo elinnya lya Mukama wo ow’Entiisa n’Ekitiibwa.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Awo eky’okugwawo bwe kirigwawo —
Tewali ayinza kulimbisa kugwawo kwa kyo —
Abamu kiribassa wansi n’abalala kiribagulumiza.
Awo ensi bw’erikankanyizibwa olukankana,
N’ensozi nezimulungulwa olumulungulwa,
Kale zirifuuka fufugge erifuumuuka,
Era muliba mu bibinja bisatu:
Kale abantu b’oku ddyo — abaffe, abantu b’oku ddyo ate be baliba batya!
Era abantu b’oku kkono — abaffe, abantu b’oku kkono ate be baliba batya!
Era abaakulembera be balikulembera.
Abo nno be b’oku lusegere lwa Allah.
Abaliba mu Janna ez’essanyu erijjuvu —
Nga ekitundu ekinene kiva mu baasooka okukkiriza Obusiraamu,
N’abatonotono nga bava mu b’oluvannyuma,
Nga bali ku ntebe empunde ne zaabu ne luulu.
Nga bagalaamiridde ku zo, nga batunuuliganye.
Nga beetooloolwamu abavubuka abatava mu kigero.
Nga babaweereza eggiraasi n’ebbinika n’ebikompe ebirimu eby’okunywa ebiva mu nsulo ezitiiriika,
Tebiribalumya mitwe wadde tebalitamiira.
Baliweebwa n’ebibala mw’ebyo bye balyeroboza,
N’ennyama y’ennyonyi mw’eyo gye balyagala.
N’abakyala amakula ab’amaaso ag’endege,
Abaling’anga luulu omukusike.
Nga y’empeera olw’ebyo bye baakolanga.
Tebaliwuliriramu bya swaakaba wadde ebibi,
Okuggyako ekigambo ky’okulamusa nti: Mirembe, mirembe.
Era abantu ab’oku ddyo — Ye ate abantu b’oku ddyo be baliba batya!
Balibeera mu miti gya sidiri egitaliiko maggwa,
N’ebitooke ebissizza,
N’ebisiikirize ebigaziyizibbwa,
N’amazzi agafukumulwa,
N’ebibala enfaafa,
Ebitasalikako era ebitaziyizibwa,
N’abakyala aba waggulu ennyo —
Ddala twabatonda olutonda,
Kale twabakola nga mbeerera,
Nga baagalwa nnyo, ba myaka egyenkanankana
Nga ba bantu b’oku ddyo.
Nga ekitundu ekinene kiva mu bantu abaasooka okukkiriza Obusiraamu,
N’ekitundu ekinene ekirala nga kiva mu b’oluvannyuma.
Era abantu b’oku kkono — Ye ate abantu b’oku kkono be baliba batya!
Balibeera mu mpewo eyokya, n’olweje,
N’ekisiikirize ky’erikka eriddugavu,
Ekitaliimu bunnyogovu wadde akalungi konna!
Ddala olubereberye lwa bino bo baalinga mu bulamu obw’eddembe n’ebyobugagga.
Era nga bagugubira nnyo ku kibi ekisukkirivu.
Era baagambanga nti: Abaffe, bwe tulifa netufuuka ettaka era nga tuli magumba, abaffe era tulizuukizibwa,
Era ne bakitaffe ab’edda?
Gamba nti: Mazima ab’olubereberye n’aboluvannyuma,
Ddala balikung’aanyizibwa ku kiseera ekyategekebwa eky’olunaku olumanyiddwa.
N’oluvannyuma nammwe abaabula, abaalimbisa amazima,
Ddala mulirya ku muti gwa Zaqqūmi,
Kale mugujjuze embuto zammwe,
N’oluvannyuma mugunywereko amazzi olweje,
Kale nga munywa ennywa ering’anga ey’eng’amira etawona nnyonta.
Okwo nga kwe kusembezebwa kwabwe ku lunaku lw’okusasulirwako.
Ffe twabatonda. Naye lwaki temukakasa bye tugamba?
Kale mulowooza mutya ku ‘mani’ ge muyiwa?
Abaffe, mmwe mugatonda oba Ffe batonzi?
Ffe twagereka okufa wakati wammwe, era Ffe tetulemwa,
Mmwe okubakyuusaamu abalala ababafaanana, mmwe netubakola mu ngeri endala gye mutamanyi.
Era ddala mumanyi bulungi entonda eyasooka. Kale lwaki temufumiitiriza?
Abaffe, mulaba mutya ebyo bye mulima?
Abaffe, mmwe mubimeza oba Ffe bameza ba byo?
Bwe tuba twagadde,ddala tubifuula ebisensebufu nemusigala nga mwesaasaabaga,
Nti: Ddala tufiirizibbwa,
Ddala ffe tummiddwa!
Abaffe, mulaba mutya amazzi ago ge munywa?
Abaffe, mmwe mugassa okuva mu bire oba Ffe bassi ba go?
Bwe tuba twagadde, tugafuula agakaawa. Kale lwaki temwebaza?
Abaffe, mulaba mutya omuliro gwe mukuma?
Abaffe, mwe mwatonda omuti ku lwa gwo oba Ffe batonzi?
Ffe twagufuula ekijjukizo era eky’omugaso eri abatambuze.
Kale tendereza erinnya lya Mukama wo, Omukulu ennyo.
Nedda, njuliza okugwa kw’emmunyeenye —
Era ddala ekyo kirayiro kikulu nnyo, singa mubadde mumanyi —
Nti ddala eno ye Kur’āni ey’Ekitiibwa,
Eri mu Kitabo ekyekusifu,
Ennono ya yo tetuukibwako, okuggyako abo abatukuzibbwa.
Kwe kubikkulirwa okwaviira ddala eri Omutonzi w’ebitonde byonna.
Abaffe, ekigambo kino mmwe kye mwekkiriranyamu?
Ddala okukirimbisa mmwe kwe mufudde ekkubo ly’okufunamu eky’okulya kyammwe?
Kale lwaki awo nga omwoyo gw’oyo afa gutuuse mu ddookooli,
Mu kiseera ekyo mutunula butunuzi,
Era Ffe tuba okumpi ennyo naye okusinga mmwe, naye mmwe lwa butalaba.
Kale obanga ddala temuli ba kulamulwa,
Lwaki temugukomyawo, obanga mwogera mazima?
Naye omufu bw’aba ng’ali mw’abo ab’oku lusegere lwa Allah.
Olwo liba ddembe n’ebyakaloosa n’e Janna ey’essanyu erijjuvu.
Ate omufu bw’aba nga ali mu bantu b’oku ddyo,
Kale agambibwa nti: Emirembe gibeere ku ggwe, owange gwe ali mu bantu b’oku ddyo.
Naye omufu bw’aba ng’ali mw’abo abaalimbisa amazima, abaabula,
Olwo okusembezebwa kwe kuliba kwa mazzi olweje,
N’okwokebwa mu muliro.
Ddala gano ge mazima amakakafu.
Kale tendereza n’erinnya lya Mukama wo Omusukkirivu.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Ebiri mu ggulu n’ebiri mu nsi byonna bitendereza Allah era ye Luwangula, Omugezi ennyo.
Obwakabaka bw’eggulu n’ensi bubwe. Y’awa obulamu era y’afiisa era ye w’Obuyinza ku buli kimu.
Ye ye w’Olubereberye era ye w’Oluvannyuma, era ye w’Olwaatu era ye Mwekusifu, era y’Amanyi obulungi buli kimu.

Ye y’eyatonda eggulu n’ensi mu biseera omukaaga, n’oluvannyuma n’atebenkera ku Nnamulondo. Y’amanyi ebiyingira mu nsi n’ebigifulumamu, n’ebyo ebikka okuva mu ggulu n’ebyambuka mu lyo. Era Ye abeera nammwe wonna we mubeera. Era byonna bye mukola, Allah abiraba.
Ye nannyini bwakabaka bw’eggulu n’ensi era eri Allah ensonga zonna gye zizzibwa.
Y’ayingiza ekiro mu misana, era y’ayingiza emisana mu kiro era y’amanyi obulungi ebiri mu bifuba.
Mukkirize Allah ne Mutume we era mutoole okuva mw’ebyo bye yabasikiza. Kale abo abakkiriza mu mmwe nebatoola mu kkubo lya Allah balifuna empeera nnene nnyo.
Ye mubadde ki obutakkiriza Allah ng’ate Omubaka abakoowoola mulyooke mukkirize Mukama wammwe, ate nga Ye yamala okutwala endagaano yammwe, obanga ddala muli bakkiriza?
Ye y’Oyo assa ku Muweereza we Aya ez’olwaatu, alyooke abaggye mu kizikiza abalaze eri obutangaavu. Era ddala Allah Musaasizi nnyo, Wa kisa nnyo gye muli.

Ye mubadde ki obutatoola mu kkubo lya Allah, so nga obusika bw’eggulu n’ensi bwa Allah? Abo mu mmwe abatoola era nebalwana nga obuwanguzi tebunnabaawo, tebenkanankana n’abo abatoola era nebalwana oluvannyuma lw’obuwanguzi. Bali babasingira wala nnyo mu madaala. Naye bonna Allah yabasuubiza ebirungi. Era bye mukola byonna Allah abimanyi bulungi.
Ani oyo anaawola Allah okuwola okulungi, kale akumukubisizeemu enfunda nnyingi era okuwola okwo akufunemu n’empeera ey’ekitiibwa?

Kw’olwo oliraba abakkiriza abasajja n’abakkiriza abakazi nga obutangaavu bwabwe bumyansa mu maaso gaabwe ne ku ddyo waabwe, baligambibwa nti: Olwa leero mawulire malungi gye muli! Ensuku ezikulukutamu emigga wansi wa zo, omwo mwe mugenda okubeera. Obwo nno bwe buwanguzi obusuffu.

Kw’olwo bannanfuusi abasajja ne bannanfuusi abakazi baligamba abo abakkiriza nti: Mutugumiikirizeeko tufune ku butangaavu bwammwe. Kirigambibwa nti: Muddeyo emabega wammwe munoonye obutangaavu obanga musobola. Olwo wakati waabwe walissibwawo ekyawula nga kiriko oluggi, nga munda wa lwo y’eri okusaasira, ate ebweeru wa lwo gye lwolekedde nga y’eri ekibonerezo.

Bannanfuusi balibakoowoola nti: Abaffe, tetwalinga wamu nammwe? Baliddamu nti: Yee, naye mmwe mweteeka mwekka mu kigezo era nemufuuka malindirizi era nemubuusabuusa era nemubuzibwabuzibwa okwagala kwammwe, n’omulimba n’ababuzaabuza ku Allah, okutuusa ekiragiro kya Allah lwe kizze.
Kale olwaleero mmwe temuggyibweko kyenunulo wadde okuva kw’abo abatakkiriza. Amaka gammwe muliro, gwo ye mukwano gwammwe. Ye nga buddo bubi nnyo!

Abaffe, era abakkiriza emitima gyabwe teginnatuuka kwetoowaza na kujjukira Allah n’ebyamazima ebyakka gye bali, era baleme na kuba ng’abo abaaweebwa Ekitabo olubereberye nebawanvuyizibwa ekiseera ky’emirembe, naye ate emitima gyabwe negikakanyala bukakanyazi? Era bangi mu bo boonoonefu.
Mumanye nti ddala Allah y’alamusa ensi oluvannyuma lw’okufa kwa yo. Mazima tubannyonnyola okulabula, mulyooke mukozese amagezi.
Mazima abasajja abawa saddaaka n’abakazi abawa saddaaka era nebawola Allah okuwola okulungi — alibakubisizaamu emirundi mingi era balifuna empeera ey’ekitiibwa.

Era abo abakkiriza Allah n’Abatume be, abo nno be b’Amazima era be Bajulizi eri Mukama waabwe. Balifuna empeera yaabwe n’obutangaavu bwabwe. Naye abo abatakkiriza era nebalimbisa Aya zaffe, abo be bantu b’omuliro.

Mumanye nti ddala obulamu bw’ensi muzanny, na kwegayaaza, na bya majolobera, n’okwewulirira ku bannammwe, n’okuvuganya mu kwaza eby’obugagga n’abaana. Okufaanana ng’enkuba bw’esanyusa abalimi olw’ebimera bya yo, naye oluvannyuma nebiwotoka, olwo n’obiraba nga bifuuse bya kyenvu; n’oluvannyuma nebifuuka ebikutufukutufu. Naye ku nkomerero eriyo ekibonerezo ekikakali, n’okusonyiwa, n’okusiima okuva eri Allah. Naye obulamu bw’ensi si kirala wabula ge masanyu agabuzaabuza.

Muvuganye mu kunoonya okusonyiyibwa okuva eri Mukama wammwe n’e Janna eyo obugazi bwa yo obwenkanankana n’obugazi bw’eggulu n’ensi, eyategekerwa abo abakkiriza Allah n’Abatume be. Egyo gy’emikisa gya Allah gy’awa oyo gw’aba asiimye. Era Allah ye Nannyini mikisa emisuffu.
Tewali kabenje konna kagwawo mu nsi wadde ku mmwe bennyini, wabula kaba mu Kitabo kuva lubereberye nga tetunnakabeezaawo. Mazima ekyo eri Allah kyangu nnyo.
Kiri bwe kityo, mulyooke muleme kusaalirwa olw’ekyo kye muba musubiddwa, era muleme na kuduula olw’ebyo by’aba abawadde. Era Allah tayagala buli eyeeragaalaga, eyeewulira.
Be bo abakodowala era nebalagira n’abantu okukodowala. Naye oyo eyeekyuusa, kale amanye nti ddala Allah y’Eyeemala, y’Atenderezebwa ennyo.

Mazima twatuma Ababaka baffe n’obubonero obw’olwaatu era netussa awamu nabo Ekitabo n’ekipima, abantu balyooke batuukirize obwenkanya; era twassa n’ekyuuma ekirimu amaanyi kasiggu n’emigaso eri abantu, era Allah alyooke amanyise oyo amuyamba n’Abatume be — newaakubadde nga Ye talabika. Mazima Allah ye w’Amaanyi ennyo, Luwangula.
Era ddala twatuma Nūhu ne Ibrāhīmu, era netussa mu zzadde lyabwe obwa Nabbi n’Ekitabo. Kale abamu mu bo baali balung’amu, naye bangi mu bo baali bajeemu.

N’oluvannyuma twagobereza mu buwufu bwabwe Ababaka baffe; era netugobereza ‘Isa Mutabani wa Maryamu netumuwa Enjiri, era netussa mu mitima gy’abo abaamugoberera ekisa n’okusaasira. Naye obusosolooti be baabwe gunjirawo bokka, Ffe tetububalagiranga, wabula baabussaawo mbu lwa kunoonya kusiima kwa Allah, naye ate tebaabukuuma mu nkuuma ya bwo entuufu. Kale twawa abo abakkiriza mu bo empeera yaabwe, naye bangi nnyo mu bo bajeemu.

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, Mutyenga nnyo Allah era mukkirize Omubaka we; olwo Allah ajja kubawa emigabo ebiri mu kusaasira kwe era abassizeewo n’obutangaavu mwe mulitambulira, era abasonyiwe. Era Allah ye Musonyiyi ennyo, Omusaasizi ennyo —

Abantu b’Ekitabo balyooke bave ku ndowooza egamba nti bo (Abasiraamu) tebalina kyonna kye basobola kukola nebafuna ku mikisa gya Allah, era bamanye nti emikisa gyonna giri mu mikono gya Allah; agiwa oyo gw’aba ayagadde. Era Allah ye Nannyini mikisa emisuffu.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.

Mazima Allah amaze okuwulira okwogera kw’omukazi atotoogana naawe ku nsonga za bba, era awanjaze n’eri Allah. Ne Allah awulidde okwogeraganya kwammwe mwembi. Mazima Allah ye Muwulizi wa byonna, Omulabi wa byonna.

Abo mu mmwe abazira bakyala baabwe nga babayita bannyaabwe — ddala tebafuuka bannyaabwe; bannyaabwe si balala wabula be bo abaabazaalira ddala. Era ddala abo bye boogera bigambo bibi nnyo era bya bulimba; naye ddala Allah ye Musanguzi w’ebibi, Omusonyiyi ennyo.

Era abo abayita bakyala baabwe bannyaabwe olw’okubeeyawulako, n’oluvannyuma nebeefukula kw’ebyo bye baayogera, kale bateekwa okuwa omuddu eddembe nga bombi tebannatuukaganako. Bwe mutyo nno bwe mubuuliriddwa ku kyo. Era byonna bye mukola Allah abitegeera.

Naye oyo atalifuna muddu, kale asiibe emyezi ebiri egiddiring’ana, nga bombi tebannatuukaganako. Naye oyo atasobola, kale aliise abanaku nkaaga. Kiri bwe kityo mulyooke mukkirize Allah n’Omubaka we. Era zino z’ensalo za Allah. Era abatakkiriza balifuna ekibonerezo ekirumya.
Mazima abo abawakanya Allah n’Omubaka we, bajja kunyoomoolwa ng’abo abaabasooka bwe baanyoomoolwa; era ddala twamala okussa Aya ez’olwaatu. Era abatakkiriza balifuna ekibonerezo ekiswaaza.
Olunaku Allah lw’alibazuukiza bonna, kale alibategeeza ebyo bye baakolanga. Allah yabibalirira mu kitabo, naye bo nebabyerabira. Era Allah ye Mujulizi ku buli kimu.

Abaffe, tolaba nti Allah y’amanyi ebiri mu ggulu n’ebiri mu nsi? Tewali kafubo konna kabaamu basatu, wabula Ye y’aba ow’okuna ku bo; oba abataano, wabula Ye y’aba ow’omukaaga ku bo; wadde abatenkana awo oba abasingawo, wabula naye aba nabo wonna we baba. N’oluvannyuma ku lunaku lw’okuzuukira, alibategeeza ebyo bye baakola. Mazima Allah y’amanyi obulungi buli kimu.

Abaffe, tewalaba abo abaaziyizibwa okuteesa mu nkukutu ate era nebaddira ekyo ekyabaziyizibwa, era nebateeseza mu nkukutu olw’okukola ebibi, n’ebyobulabe, n’okujeemera Omubaka? Era bwe bajja gy’oli, bakulamusa n’e kiramuso Allah ky’ataakulamusa na kyo, neboogera ne mu myoyo gyabwe nti: Lwaki Allah tatubonereza olw’ebyo bye twogera? Omuliro gwe balyokebwamu gwe gulibamala. Naye obwo nga buddo bubi nnyo!

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, bwe muteesezanga mu kyaama, temuteesanga lwa kukola kibi, n’obulabe, n’okujeemera Omubaka, wabula muteesenga mu kyaama lwa kukola birungi na kutya Allah. Era mutye nnyo Allah Oyo gy’ali gye mulikung’aanyirizibwa.
Mazima okuteesa mu kyaama olw’ebibi kikolwa kya Sitaani, akikola alyooke anakuwaze abo abakkiriza; naye tayinza kubalumya mu kyonna, mpozzi nga Allah akkirizza. Era abakkiriza beesigenga Allah yekka.

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, bwe mugambibwanga mu nkung’aana nti: Muwe ekyaanya, kale muwanga ekyaanya, ne Allah alibawa ekyaanya. Ate bwe mugambibwanga nti: Musituke, kale musitukanga; Allah alisitula mu madaala abo abakkiriza mu mmwe n’abo abaaweebwa okumanya. Era bye mukola byonna Allah abitegeera.

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, bwe mwebuuzanga ku Mutume mu kyaama, kale mukulembezenga saddaaka olubereberye lw’akafubo kammwe. Ekyo ky’ekisinga obulungi gye muli era ky’ekisinga n’obulongoofu. Naye bwe mutafunanga kye mutoola, kale ddala Allah ye Musonyiyi ennyo, Omusaasizi ennyo.

Abaffe, mutya okukulembeza saddaaka olubereberye lw’okwebuuza kwammwe ku Mutume mu kyaama? Kale ekyo bwe mutaasobole kukikola — Allah abaddiremu — kale nno mujjumbire nnyo essaala era mutoole zaka era mugondere nnyo Allah n’Omubaka we. Era byonna bye mukola, Allah abitegeera.
Abaffe, tewalaba abo abaakwanagana n’abantu Allah be yasunguwalira? Abo tebali mu mmwe wadde tebali mu bo, era balayira ne ku by’obulimba nga ddala bamanyi.
Allah yabategekera ekibonerezo ekikakali. Ddala bibi nnyo ebyo bye baakolanga.
Baatwala okulayira kwabwe nga engabo, kale nebeekiika mu kkubo lya Allah, n’olwekyo balifuna ekibonerezo ekiswaaza.
Eby’obugagga bwaabwe wadde abaana baabwe tebijja kubagasa wadde akatono ku Allah. Abo be bantu b’omuliro, bo mu gwo mwe balibeera.
Olunaku Allah lw’alizuukiza bonna awamu, kale balimulayirira nga bwe babalayirira, nga balowooza nti balina kye baliko. Mwetegereze! Ddala bo be balimba.
Sitaani yabeefuga, kale n’abeerabiza okujjukira Allah. Abo ekibiina kya Sitaani. Mwetegereze! Mazima ekibiina kya Sitaani be b’okufaafaaganirwa.
Mazima abo abawakanya Allah n’Omubaka we, abo be bali mu banyoomoofu ennyo.
Allah yalangirira dda nti: Mazima Nze nnaawangulanga bulijjo, Nze n’Ababaka bange. Mazima Allah ye w’Amaanyi ennyo, Luwangula.

Tojja kusanga bantu bakkiriza Allah n’olunaku lw’enkomerero nga baagalana n’abo abawakanya Allah n’Omubaka we, ne bwe baba nga be bakitaabwe, oba baana baabwe, oba baganda baabwe, oba ab’eng’anda zaabwe. Abo nno Allah be yawandiika ku mitima gyabwe obukkiriza era n’abawagira n’omwoyo oguva gy’ali. Era alibayingiza mu nsuku ezikulukutamu emigga wansi wa zo. Omwo mwe balibeera, nga Allah musanyufu gye bali, nabo nga basanyufu gy’ali. Abo nno be b’ekibinja kya Allah. Mwetegereze! Ddala ab’ekibinja kya Allah be b’okuganyulwa.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Ebiri mu ggulu n’ebiri mu nsi byonna bitendereza Allah; era ye Luwangula, Omugezi ennyo.

Ye y’eyafulumya abo abatakkiriza mu bantu b’Ekitabo okuva mu maka gaabwe mu kuwang’angusa okwasooka. Mmwe temwalowooza nti balivaamu era nabo baalowooza nti ebigo byabwe bijja kubawonya Allah. Naye nno Allah yabajjira mu ngeri gye bataalowoozaako, n’assa ensisi mu mitima gyabwe, nebazikiriza ennyumba zaabwe n’emikono gyabwe wamu n’emikono gy’abakkiriza. Kale mmwe abalina amaaso, ekyo mukitwale ng’ekyokulabula.
Era singa tekyali nti Allah yabasalira kuwang’angusibwa, mazima yaalibabonerezza mu nsi muno. Ate ne ku nkomerero, balina ekibonerezo ky’omuliro.
Ekyo lwa kubanga baawakanya Allah n’Omubaka we. Era oyo awakanya Allah, kale ddala Allah mukakali nnyo mu kubonereza.
Omutende gwonna gwe mwatema oba gwe mwalekawo nga guyimidde ku mirandira gya gwo, kale kyali lwa kukkiriza kwa Allah, era alyooke aswaaze aboononefu.

Era omunyago gwonna Allah gwe yawa Omubaka we okuva gye bali, mmwe temwaguddusizaako mbalaasi wadde eng’amira zammwe, naye Allah y’awa Ababaka be obuyinza kw’oyo gw’aba ayagadde. Era Allah ye w’Obuyinza ku buli kimu.

Eby’omunyago byonna Allah by’aba awadde Omubaka we okuva mu bantu b’omu bibuga, kale biba bya Allah, n’Omubaka, n’ababe, ne bamulekwa, n’abankuseere, n’abatambuze; olwo eby’obugagga biryooke bireme kwetoolorera mu bagagga bokka mu mmwe. Era ekyo kyonna Omubaka ky’abanga abawadde, kale mukitwalenga; ate ekyo kyonna ky’abanga abagaanye, kale mukirekenga. Era mutye nnyo Allah. Mazima Allah mukakali mu kubonereza.

Era omunyago gwa banaku Abasenguse abo abaaagobebwa mu maka gaabwe ne ku by’obugagga bwabwe nga banoonya emikisa egiva eri Allah n’okusiima kwe, era nebayamba Allah n’Omubaka we. Abo nno be b’amazima.

Era n’abo abaategeka amaka e Madina nebakkiriza olubereberye lwabwe, baagalana n’abo abaasengukira gye bali, era tebawulira nkenyera yonna mu mitima gyabwe kw’ebyo ebiba biweereddwa Abasenguse, era bakulembeza Abasenguse okusinga ne ku bo bennyini, newankubadde nga bo bennyini bali mu bwavu. Era oyo awonyezebwa okululunkana kw’omwoyo gwe, kale abo be baliganyulwa.

Era n’abo abajja oluvannyuma lwabwe nga bagamba nti: Mukama waffe, tusonyiwe era ne baganda baffe abo abaatukulembera mu kukkiriza, era tossa ffutwa mu mitima gyaffe kw’abo abakkiriza. Mukama waffe, mazima Ggwe Musaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.

Abaffe, tewalaba abo abaafuuka bannanfuusi? Baagamba baganda baabwe abo abatakkiriza mu bantu b’Ekitabo nti: Singa ddala munaagobebwa mu Madina, mazima naffe tujja kugenda nammwe, era tetugenda kugondera yenna ku bikwata ku mmwe ddi na ddi; era bwe mulirwanyisibwa, mazima tulibayamba. Naye Allah akakasa nti ddala bo balimba.
Bwe baligobebwa, tebaligenda nabo, era ne bwe balirwanyisibwa, tebalibayamba. Ate ne bwe balibayamba, ddala balikubayo enkoona; n’oluvannyuma abannanfuusi tebaliyambibwa.
Ddala mmwe be batya ennyo mu mitima gyabwe n’okusinga Allah; ekyo lwa kubanga be bantu abatategeera.

Tebayinza kulwana nammwe bonna lumu, mpozzi nga bali mu bibuga ebiriko ebigo oba nga bali mabega wa bisenge. So nno okulwanagana kwabwe bokka na bokka kukakali. Ggwe obalowooza nti bali bumu, naye emitima gyabwe myawufu. Ekyo lwa kubanga be bantu abatakozesa magezi.
Bafaanana n’abo abaabakulembera emabegako katono abaaloza ku bubi bw’ebikolwa byabwe. Ate nno balinayo n’ekibonerezo ekirumya ennyo.
Okufaanana nga Sitaani bw’agamba omuntu nti: Weereme! Naye bwe yeerema, olwo ng’agamba nti: Mazima nkwesambye; ddala nze ntya nnyo Allah, Omutonzi w’ebitonde byonna.
Kale enkomerero ya bombi n’eba nti ddala bombi ba mu muliro, omwo mwe balibeera. Anti eyo y’empeera y’abakozi b’ebibi.
Abange mmwe abakkiriza, mutyenga nnyo Allah era omuntu asaanye yeetegerezenga nnyo ebyo by’akulembezza olw’olunaku lw’enkya. Era mutye nnyo Allah. Mazima Allah ategeera bulungi bye mukola.
Era temubanga ng’abo abeerabira Allah, kale ne Allah n’abeerabiza emyoyo gyabwe. Abo nno be boonoonefu.
Abantu b’omu muliro n’abantu b’omu Janna tebayinza kwenkanankana. Abantu b’omu Janna bo be bawanguzi.
Singa Kur’āni eno twagissa ku lusozi, mazima waalilulabye nga lwetòowaza, nga lwabikayabika olw’okutya Allah. Era eby’okulabirako bino tubireetera abantu, balyooke bafumiitirize.
Ye ye Allah. Tewali musinzibwa mulala mutuufu okuggyako Ye. Ye Mumanyi w’ebitalabika. Ye ye Musaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.

Ye ye Allah. Tewali musinzibwa mulala mutuufu okuggyako Ye, Kabwejungira, Omutukuvu, Omuwi w’emirembe, Omuwi w’eddembe, Omulabirizi, Luwangula, Omuddaabirizi, Omugulumivu. Omutuukirivu ye Allah, ali ewala ennyo n’ebyo bye benkanya naye.
Ye ye Allah, Omutonzi, Omutandisi wa buli kimu, Omuyiiya w’enfaanana. Y’alina amatendo amakula. Ebiri mu ggulu ne mu nsi Ye gwe bitendereza, era ye Luwangula, Omugezi ennyo.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, temutwalanga abalabe bange n’abalabe bammwe okuba ab’emikwano, nemubalaga okwagala ng’ate baagaana amazima agajja gye muli, nebagoba n’Omubaka nammwe okuva mu maka gammwe mbu olw’okubanga mukkiriza Allah Mukama wammwe. Naye bwe muba nga mugenze mu lutalo mu kkubo lyange n’okunoonya okusiima kwange, abamu mu mmwe mubatumira mu nkukutu olw’omukwano, naye Nze mmanyi bulungi ebyo bye mukisa n’ebyo bye mwoleka. Era oyo alikikola mu mmwe, ddala aliba awabye ku kkubo ettuufu.
Kuba bo bwe baba nga be babavuumbikirizza, baba balabe bammwe mu lwaatu era babagololera n’emikono gyabwe n’ennimi zaabwe mu ngeri embi; era beegomba nnyo nti singa mufuuse abatakkiriza.
Eng’anda zammwe wadde abaana bammwe tebalibagasa ku lunaku lw’okuzuukira. Allah y’aliramula wakati wammwe, era byonna bye mukola Allah abiraba.

Mazima mwalina eky’okulabirako ekirungi mu Ibrāhīmu n’abo abaali naye, awo bwe baagamba bannaabwe nti: Mazima ffe tubeesambye era n’ebyo bye musinza ebbali wa Allah. Mazima ffe tubegaanye. Obulabe obw’olubeerera n’obukyayi bimaze okweyoleka wakati waffe nammwe, okutuusa lwe mulikkiriza Allah Omu yekka — mpozzi ye Ibrāhīmu ku lulwe n’agamba kitaawe nti: Mazima nzija kukusabira okusonyiyibwa, naye nga nze sirina buyinza ku kyonna ku lulwo ku Allah. Kye baava basaba nti: Mukama waffe, twesiga Ggwe wekka, era gy’oli gye twetoowaza era gy’oli y’eri obuddo.
Mukama waffe, totufuula kigezo eri abo abatakkiriza era tusonyiwe, Mukama waffe. Mazima Ggwe Luwangula, Omugezi ennyo.
Mazima ddala mulina mu bo eky’okulabirako ekirungi ennyo eri abo abalina essuubi mu Allah n’olunaku lw’enkomerero. Naye oyo eyekyuusa, mazima Allah ye Yeemala, y’Atenderezebwa ennyo.
Ob’olyawo Allah anassa okwagalana wakati wammwe n’abo be mulinako obulabe mu bo. Era Allah ye w’Obuyinza. Era Allah ye Musonyiyi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Allah tabaziyiza kw’abo abatalwanagana nammwe olw’eddiini era abatabagoba mu maka gammwe, okubakolera ekisa n’okuba abenkanya gye bali. Mazima Allah ayagala nnyo abenkanya.

Wabula Allah abaziyiza kw’abo bokka abalwanagana nammwe olw’eddiini era nebabagoba ne mu maka gammwe, oba nebayamba abalabe bammwe basobole okubagoba, abo mwaziyizibwa okukwanagana nabo. Era yenna akwanagana n’abo, kale abo be boonoonyi.

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, abakazi abakkiriza bwe bajjanga gye muli nga Basenguse, kale mubagezesenga. Allah y’asinga okumanya obulungi okukkiriza kwabwe. Kale bwe mumanyanga nti ddala bakkiriza, olwo temubazzangayo eri abatakkiriza. Kuba abo baba tebakyakkirizibwa gye bali, era nabo baba tebakyakkirizibwa eri abakyala abo. Naye ba bbaabwe abatakkiriza mubawe ebyo bye baatoola ku bo. Era temubaako kisobyo muba mubawasizza, bwe muba nga mubawadde amahare gaabwe. Naye temuddiranga abakyala abatakkiriza nemugattibwa nabo; naye nammwe bwe mutyo musabe abatakkiriza ebyo bye mwatoola ku bakazi bammwe, nabo babasabe ebyo bye baatoola ku baabwe. Okwo nno kwe kulamula kwa Allah. Bw’atyo bw’alamula wakati wammwe. Era Allah ye Mumanyi wa byonna, Omugezi ennyo.

Era yenna mu bakyala bammwe bw’anoberanga eri abatakkiriza, oluvannyuma bwe mwesasuzanga nemufuna omunyago, kale muwenga abo abanobebwako bakyala baabwe eby’enkanankana n’ebyo bye baatoola ku bo. Era mutye nnyo Allah Oyo gwe mukkiriza.

Owange ggwe Nabbi, abakazi abakkiriza bwe bajjanga gy’oli nga beeyama obuwulize gy’oli nga bwe batajja kwenkanya Allah ne kyonna era nga bwe batajja kubba era nga bwe batajja kwenda era nti tebajja kutta baana baabwe era nti tebajja kuleeta bya kuwaayiriza kwe bajinjejinze wakati w’emikono gyabwe n’amagulu gaabwe era nti tebaakujeemerenga mu bituufu, kale kkiriza obweyamo bwabwe era obasabire n’okusonyiyibwa eri Allah. Mazima Allah ye Musonyiyi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Abange mmwe abakkiriza, temukwananga bantu Allah be yasunguwalira; kuba baba baamala okuggwebwamu essuubi ly’Enkomerero, okufaanana ng’abatakkiriza bwe baggwebwamu essuubi ku bantu b’omu ntaana.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Ebiri mu ggulu n’ebiri mu nsi byonna bitendereza Allah; era Ye ye Luwangula, Omugezi ennyo.
Abange mmwe abakkiriza, Lwaki mwogera ebyo bye mutakola?
Kikyayibwa nnyo nnyini eri Allah mmwe okwogera ebyo bye mutakola.
Mazima Allah ayagala nnyo abo abalwana mu kkubo lye mu nnyiriri nga baling’anga omusekese ogusibiddwa n’essasi.

Era jjukira nga Mūsa bwe yagamba abantu be nti: Abange, lwaki munnumya ng’ate mumanyi nti ddala ndi Mubaka wa Allah gye muli? Kale bwe baawuguka, ne Allah n’awugula emitima gyabwe. Era Allah talung’amya bantu bajeemu.

Era jjukira nga ‘Isa, mutabani wa Maryamu bwe yagamba nti: Abange abaana ba Isirairi, mazima nze ndi Mubaka wa Allah gye muli, nze mukakasa w’ebyo ebyankulembera ebiri mu Taurēti, era nze muwi w’amawulire ag’essanyu ag’Omubaka alijja oluvannyuma lwange, erinnya lye ye Ahmad. Kale Omulangwa bwe yabatuukako n’obukakafu obw’olwaatu, baagamba nti: Kuno kubuzaabuza kwa lwaatu.
Naye ani asinga obwoonoonyi kw’oyo apaatika ku Allah eby’obulimba ate nga akoowoolerwa eri Obusiraamu? Era Allah talung’amya bantu boonoonyi.
Baagala okuzikiza obutangaavu bwa Allah n’emimwa gyabwe, naye Allah ajja kutuukiriza obutangaavu bwe, abatakkiriza ne bwe banaaba nga tebaagala.
Ye y’eyatuma Omubaka we n’obulung’amu n’eddiini ey’amazima, alyooke agiwanguzise eddiini zonna, newaakubadde nga abamwenkanya n’ebirala tebaagala.
Abange mmwe abakkiriza, mbategeeze eky’obusuubuzi ekiribawonya ekibonerezo ekirumya?
Mukkirize Allah n’Omubaka we, era mufube nnyo mu kkubo lya Allah n’ebyobugagga bwammwe n’obwennyini bwammwe. Ekyo ky’ekisinga obulungi gye muli, singa mubadde mumanyi.
Allah ajja kubasonyiwa ebyonoono byammwe era abayingize mu nsuku ezikulukutamu emigga wansi wa zo, n’amaka amalungi agali mu Janna ez’olubeerera. Obwo nno bwe buwanguzi obusuffu.
N’ekirala kye mwagala alikibawa — nga bwe buyambi obuva eri Allah n’obuwanguzi obw’okumpi. Kale wa abakkiriza amawulire ag’essanyu.

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, mubeere bayambi ba Allah, nga ‘Isa mutabani wa Maryamu bwe yagamba abayigirizwa be nti: B’ani abayambi bange ku lwa Allah? Abayigirizwa baddamu nti: Ffe bayambi ba Allah. Kale ekibiina ekimu mu baana ba Isirairi nekkiriza, naye ekirala nekyerema. Kale netuwagira abo abakkiriza ku mulabe waabwe, nebafuuka abawanguzi.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Ebiri mu ggulu n’ebiri mu nsi byonna bitendereza Allah, Kabaka, Omutukuvu, Luwangula, Omugezi ennyo.
Ye y’eyatuma Omubaka mu bantu abatamanyi kusoma ng’ava mu bo, abasomere Aya ze era abatukuze era abayigirize Ekitabo n’eby’amagezi, newaakubadde nga olubereberye baali mu kubula kwa lwaatu;
Era alituma n’eri abalala mu bo abatannabeegattako. Era Ye ye Luwangula, Omugezi ennyo.
Egyo nno gy’emikisa gya Allah, agiwa oyo gw’aba asiimye. Era Allah ye Nannyini mikisa emisuffu.

Enfaanana y’abo abaakwasibwa amateeka ga Taurēti n’oluvannyuma nebatagatuukiriza, baling’anga endogoyi eyeetisse ebitabo. Mbi nnyo embeera y’abantu abalimbisa obubonero bwa Allah. Era Allah talung’amya bantu boonoonyi.
Gamba nti: Abange mmwe Abayudaaya, obanga mwebala nti ddala mmwe mikwano gya Allah nga abantu abalala tebaliiko, kale mwooye okufa, obanga muli ba mazima.
Naye tebagenda kukwooya ddi na ddi olw’ebyo emikono gyabwe bye gyakulembeza. Era Allah amanyi bulungi abakozi b’ebibi.
Gamba nti: Mazima okufa kwe mudduka, ddala kwa kubatuukako. N’oluvannyuma mulizzibwayo eri Omumanyi w’ebitalabika n’ebirabika, olwo abategeeze ebyo bye mwakolanga.

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, Adhāni bw’ekoowoolwanga olw’essaala ku lunaku lwa Jumu’ah, kale musitukirengamu mugende eri okutendereza Allah, era mulekenga eby’amaguzi. Ekyo ky’ekisinga obulungi gye muli, singa mubadde mumanyi.
Kale essaala bw’eggwanga, olwo musaasaane mu nsi munoonye ku mikisa gya Allah, era mutendereze nnyo Allah, lwe mujja okuganyulwa.

Naye bwe balaba eby’obusuubuzi oba eby’amasanyu, baabuka nebalaga gye biri, ne bakuleka nga wesimbye. Gamba nti: Ebyo ebiri eri Allah by’ebisinga obulungi ku by’amasanyu n’ebyobusuubuzi. Era Allah y’asinga abagabi bonna.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.

Awo bannanfuusi bwe bajja gy’oli, bagamba nti: Tukakasa nti ddala ggwe oli Mubaka wa Allah. Ne Allah akimanyi nti ddala ggwe oli Mubaka we, naye Allah akakasa, awatali kuwannaanya, nti ddala bannanfuusi balimba.
Okulayira kwabwe bakutwala nga engabo, olwo nebeekiika mu kkubo lya Allah. Mazima bye bakola bibi nnyo.
Ekyo lwa kubanga bakkiriza, n’oluvannyuma nebeerema, kale emitima gyabwe negissibwako envumbo; bwe batyo tebakyategeera.

Era bw’obalaba, endabika y’emibiri gyabwe ekusanyusa. Ne bwe boogera, ebigambo byabwe obiwuliriza. Baling’anga ebiti ebizigiikirire (kasajjaffuba). Balowooza nti buli kizibu kijjirira bo. Abo nno be balabe, kale beerinde. Allah abakolimire. Kale ate bawugulwa batya!
Era bwe bagambibwa nti: Mujje, Omubaka wa Allah abasabire okusonyiyibwa, bakyuusa emitwe gyabwe era obalaba nga bawalira era nga beekuza.
Ky’ekimu gye bali ggwe okubasabira okusonyiyibwa oba obutabasabira kusonyiyibwa, Ye Allah tagenda kubasonyiwa. Mazima Allah talung’amya bantu bajeemu.
Be bamu abagamba nti: Temutoola konna eri abo abali n’Omubaka wa Allah okutuusa lwe balisasika nebamulekawo, so nga amawanika g’omu ggulu ne mu nsi ga Allah; naye era bannanfuusi tebategeera.
Bagamba nti: Bwe tunaddayo e Madina, ddala asinga ekitiibwa ajja kugoba asinga obunyoomoofu mu kyo. So ng’ate ekitiibwa kyonna kya Allah n’Omubaka we n’abakkiriza; naye era bannanfuusi tebamanyi.
Abange mmwe abakkiriza, eby’obugagga bwammwe n’abaana bammwe biremenga kubawugula ku kujjukira Allah. Naye oyo alikola ekyo, kale abo be b’okufaafaaganirwa.

Era mutoolenga mw’ebyo bye twabawa nga omu mu mmwe tannatuukwako kufa, n’oluvannyuma agambe nti: Mukama wange, singa ondwisizzawo akaseera akampimpi, kale nalitodde saddaaka era naalibadde mu bakozi ba birungi.
Naye Allah talwisaawo muntu nga entuuko ye etuuse. Era bye mukola byonna Allah abitegeera.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Ebiri mu ggulu n’ebiri mu nsi byonna bitendereza Allah. Obwakabaka bwonna bubwe n’amatendo gonna gage era Ye ye w’Obuyinza ku buli kimu.
Ye y’eyabatonda, naye mu mmwe mulimu abatakkiriza ne mu mmwe mulimu abakkiriza. Era bye mukola, Allah abiraba.
Y’eyatonda eggulu n’ensi mu butuufu, n’akola enfaanana yammwe, n’ayooyoota ekikula kyammwe, era gy’ali y’eri obuddo.
Y’amanyi byonna ebiri mu migigi gy’eggulu ne mu nsi era y’amanyi byonna bye mukisa ne bye mwoleka. Era Allah y’amanyi ebiri mu bifuba.
Abaffe, temutuukwangako ebyafa kw’abo abeereema olubereberye? Kale baaloza ku bubi obuva mu bikolwa byabwe, era balifuna n’ekibonerezo ekirumya.

Ekyo lwa kubanga baatuukwangako Abatume baabwe n’obubonero obw’olwaatu, naye nebagamba nti: Abaffe, abantu obuntu banaatulung’amya? Kale beerema nebakubayo amabega, naye Allah naye teyali mwetaavu gye bali. Anti Allah y’Eyeemala, Atenderezebwa ennyo.
Abatakkiriza beebala nti tebalizuukizibwa. Gamba nti: Si kyo. Mu mazima ga Mukama wange, ddala mulizuukizibwa, n’oluvannyuma ddala mulitegeezebwa ebyo bye mwakola; era ekyo eri Allah kyangu nnyo.
Kale mukkirize Allah n’Omubaka we n’Ekitangaala kye twassa. Era bye mukola Allah abitegeera.

Olunaku lw’alibakung’aanya ku lunaku lw’okukung’aana, olwo nno lwe lunaku lw’okufiirwa n’okufuna. Naye oyo akkiriza Allah n’akola ebikolwa ebirungi, alimusangulako ebibi bye era alimuyingiza mu nsuku ezikulukutamu emigga wansi wa zo; omwo mwe balibeera olubeerera. Obwo nno bwe buwanguzi obusuffu.
Naye abo abatakkiriza era nebalimbisa Aya zaffe, abo be bantu b’omuliro; omwo mwe balibeera. Era obwo buddo bubi ennyo!
Tewali kabenje konna kabaawo wabula na kukkiriza kwa Allah. Era oyo akkiriza Allah, Allah alung’amya omutima gwe. Era Allah amanyi bulungi buli kimu.
Era mugondere Allah ate mugondere n’Omubaka. Naye bwe mulyekyuusa, kale ekiri ku Mubaka waffe kutuusa bubaka mu lwaatu.
Allah! Teri musinzibwa mutuufu okuggyako Ye. Era abakkiriza, Allah yekka gwe babanga beesiga.
Abange mmwe abakkiriza, mazima abamu mu bakyala bammwe n’abaana bammwe balabe bammwe, kale mubeerinde. Naye bwe muleka nemubaddiramu era nemusonyiwa, mazima Allah ye Musonyiyi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Mazima eby’obugagga bwammwe n’abaana bammwe kigezo. Era eri Allah y’eri empeera ensuffu.

Kale mutye Allah ewala ennyo nga bwe musobola era muwulirize era mugondere Allah era mutoole mu kkubo lye, ky’ekirungi gye muli. Naye oyo awonyezebwa okululunkana kw’omwoyo gwe, kale abo be baliganyulwa.
Bwe muwola Allah okuwola okulungi, ajja kukubakubisizaamu emirundi n’emirundi era abasonyiwe. Era Allah ye Musiimi ennyo, Alumirwa ennyo abaddu be,
Ye Mumanyi w’ebitalabika n’ebirabika, ye Luwangula, Omugezi ennyo.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.

Owange ggwe Nabbi! Bwe mubanga muta abakazi, kale mubateerenga ku kiseera kyabwe ekya ‘Idda era mubalirirenga ekiseera; era mutye Allah, Mukama wammwe. Temubagobanga mu nju zaabwe wadde nabo tebavangamu, okuggyako nga bakoze eky’ekivve eky’olwaatu. Ezo nno z’ensalo za Allah. Era oyo abuuka ensalo za Allah, aba yeryazaamaanyizza yekka, kuba ggwe awa Talaka tomanya, ob’olyawo Allah n’aleetawo ensonga endala oluvannyuma lw’ebyo byonna.

Kale bwe babanga banaatera okutuuka ku kiseera kyabwe eky’okubata naye nga mwaagala okudding’ana nabo, kale mubasigazenga lwa bulungi, oba mwawukanenga nabo lwa bulungi. Naye mussangawo abajulizi babiri abenkanya okuva mu mmwe era muwanga obujulizi obwesimbu ku lwa Allah. Ebyo bibuuliriddwa oyo akkiriza Allah n’olunaku lw’enkomerero. Era oyo atya Allah, Allah amuteerawo obufulumiro,
Era amugabira okuva ne w’atasuubira. Era oyo eyesiga Allah, kale Ye Allah amumala. Mazima Allah ajja kutuukiriza ensonga ye. Ddala buli kimu Allah yakissaako ekigero.

Era n’abo mu bakazi bammwe abaggweebwamu essuubi ly’okusuulumba, bwe muba nga mubuusabuusa ku mbalirira ya ‘Idda, kale embalirira yaabwe gy’emyezi esatu, bwe kityo ne kw’abo abatannasuulumba. Naye abo abali embuto, ekiseera kyabwe kumala kwetikkula buzito bwabwe. Era oyo atya Allah, amuteerawo obwangu mu nsonga ye.
Ekyo ky’ekiragiro kya Allah ky’assizza gye muli. Era oyo atya Allah, amusangulako ebibi bye n’amugezzeseza empeera.

Abakyala abagenda okuteebwa mubabeezenga mu nju mwe mubeera, mubalabirire okusinziira ku nfuna yammwe, naye temubalumyanga nga mugenderera kubakaluubiriza. Naye bwe babanga bali mbuto, olwo mubawenga ebyetaago okutuusa lwe balyetikkula obuzito bwabwe. Era bwe babayonsezanga abaana bammwe, kale mubawenga empeera yaabwe, era muteesaganyenga ku nsonga eziri wakati wammwe mu butuufu. Naye bwe muzibuwaliragananga, kale omukazi omulala amumuyonseze.

Oyo alina eby’obugagga atoole ekisaanira mu by’obugagga bwe. N’oyo eyakendeerezebwa okuweebwa kwe, kale naye atoole mw’ebyo Allah bye yamuwa. Allah tatikka muntu buvunaanyizibwa wabula asinziira ku busobozi bwe yamuwa. Mangu nnyo Allah ajja kuleeta obwangu oluvannyuma lw’obuzibu.
Ye ebibuga bimeka ebyajeemera ekiragiro kya Mukama wa byo n’Ababaka be, kale netubibalirira embalirira enkakali era netubibonereza ekibonerezo ekikambwe!
Kale nebiroza ku bubi bw’ensonga za byo, era enkomerero y’ensonga za byo kwali kufaafaaganirwa.
Allah yabategekera ekibonerezo ekikakali; kale mutye nnyo Allah, abange mmwe abalina amagezi, mmwe abakkiriza. Mazima Allah yamala okuweereza gye muli Omujjukiza —

Omubaka abasomera Aya za Allah ez’olwaatu, alyooke aggye abo abakkiriza nebakola ebikolwa ebirungi mu kizikiza abalaze eri obutangaavu. Naye oyo akkiriza Allah n’akola ebikolwa ebirungi, alimuyingiza mu nsuku ezikulukutiramu emigga wansi wa zo, omwo mwe balibeera olubeerera. Mazima Allah yamulungiyiza ebigabibwa.

Allah y’Oyo eyatonda emigigi gy’eggulu omusanvu, n’egyensi nga gyenkana na gyo. Ekiragiro kikka wakati mu gyo, mulyooke mumanye nti ddala Allah ye w’Obuyinza ku buli kimu era nti ddala Allah yeetooloola buli kimu mu kumanya.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Owange ggwe Nabbi! Lwaki weziza ebyo Allah bye yakukkiriza, onoonya kusiima kwa bakyala bo? Naye Allah Musonyiyi nnyo, Wa kisa kingi.
Mazima Allah yabalumiriza okusumulula ebirayiro byammwe era Allah ye Mukwano gwammwe owa ddala; era Ye ye Mumanyi wa byonna, Omugezi ennyo.

Era awo Mutume bwe yategeeza omu ku bakyala be ensonga mu kyaama, kale ye (omukyala) bwe yagitegeezako omulala, ne Allah n’akimanyisa (Mutume), ye Mutume yamanyisaako omukyala ebimu, ebirala n’abireka. Naye Mutume bwe yamala okubimutegeeza, omukyala n’agamba nti: Bino ani yabikutegeezezza? Mutume n’agamba nti: Omumanyi wa byonna, Ategeera byonna y’eyantegeezezza.

Kale mwembi bwe muneenenya eri Allah— anti era n’emitima gyammwe gyolekedde eri kwenenya— ky’ekisinga obulungi gye muli. Naye bwe munayambagana ku ye, mazima Allah ye Muyambi we ne Jiburiiru n’abatuukirivu abakkiriza; n’oluvannyuma lw’ekyo, ba malayika nabo bayambi be.

Ob’olyawo mmwe bw’anaabawa Talaka, Mukama we anaamukyusizaamu abakyala abasinga ku mmwe abajeemulukufu, abakkiriza, abawulize, abeenenyi, abasinza Allah, abasiibi, okuva mu bakazi abakulu ab’obusa n’embeerera.

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, mwewonye omuliro n’ab’omu maka gammwe, anti enku za gwo bantu na mayinja; guliko ba malayika abakambwe, abakakali abatajeemera Allah ky’abalagidde era abakola ekyo kyokka kye balagiddwa.
Abange mmwe abatakkiriza, temuwampanya olwa leero. Mazima mugenda kusasulwa olw’ebyo bye mwakola.

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, mubonere re eri Allah okubonera okwa nnamaddala. Ob’olyawo Mukama wammwe n’abasangulako ebibi byammwe era n’abayingiza mu nsuku ezikulukutamu emigga wansi wa zo, ku lunaku Allah lw’ataliswaaza Nabbi n’abo abakkiriza awamu naye. Obutangaavu bwabwe bulimyansa mu maaso gaabwe ne ku ddyo waabwe. Baligamba nti: Mukama waffe, tujjuulirize obutangaavu bwaffe era otusonyiwe; ddala Ggwe w’Obuyinza ku buli kimu.
Owange gwe Nabbi, nyiikirira nnyo abatakkiriza ne bannanfuusi era ba munyweevu ku bo. Era obuddo bwabwe muliro. Ye nga obwo buddo bubi nnyo!

Embeera y’abo abatakkiriza, Allah agifaananyiriza n’eya muka Nūhu ne muka Lūṭi. Bombi nno baali wansi wa baweereza babiri mu baweereza baffe abatuukirivu, naye bombi nebaba balyaake gye bali. Naye bombi tebaabagasa n’akatono ku Allah, era bombi baagambibwa nti: Muyingire omuliro wamu n’abo abayingira.

Ate embeera y’abakkiriza, Allah yagifaananyiriza n’eya muka Farāwo, awo bwe yagamba nti: Mukama wange, nzimbira gy’oli enju mu Janna, era mponya Farāwo n’ebikolwa bye, era mponya abantu abakozi b’ebibi,
Era agifaananyiriza n’eya Maryamu muwala wa ‘Imrāni eyeekuuma,kale netufuuwa mu ye (‘Isa) ekigambo kyaffe, Maryamu n’akakasa amazima g’ebigambo bya Mukama we n’Ebitabo bye era yali mw’abo abawulize.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Nannyini mikisa y’Oyo alina mu mikono gye obwakabaka, era ye w’Obuyinza ku buli kimu.
Y’Oyo eyatonda okufa n’obulamu alyooke abagezese, alage ani mu mmwe asinga mu kukola obulungi; era Ye ye Luwangula, Omusonyiyi ennyo,
Y’Oyo eyatonda emigigi gy’eggulu omusanvu nga gitabagana. Toyinza kulaba njawukana yonna mu kutonda kw’Omusaasizi ennyo. Kale ddamu okutunula; abaffe, olabawo akamogo konna?
N’oluvannyuma ddamu okutunula enfunda bbiri, okutunula kwo kujja kukomawo gy’oli nga kulemereddwa era nga kukooye.
Era ddala twawunda eggulu ery’okumpi n’amataala, netugafuula ag’okugoba ba Sitaani, era netubategekera ekibonerezo ky’omuliro.
Era waliwo ekibonerezo ky’omuliro olw’abo abatakkiriza Mukama waabwe. Era obwo buddo bubi nnyo!
Awo bwe baligusuulibwamu, baliguwulira nga guwuluguma nga bwe gubumbujja,
Nga guling’anga ogugenda okwabika olw’essungu. Buli lwe gulisuulwangamu ekibinja, abalabirizi ba gwo balibabuuzanga nti: Abaffe, mmwe temwatuukwako Mulabuzi?
Baliddamu nti: Yee! Ddala Omulabuzi yatutuukako naye netulimbisa, netugamba nti: Allah tassanga kintu kyonna; wabula mmwe muli mu kubula kunene.
Era baligamba nti: Singa twawulira oba singa twakozesa amagezi, tetwalibadde mu bantu ba muliro ogubumbujja.
Olwo balikkiriza ebibi byabwe. Kale okuzikirira kwa bantu b’omu muliro ogubumbujja.
Mazima abo abatya Mukama waabwe, wadde nga talabika, balifuna okusonyiyibwa n’empeera ennene ennyo.
Kale mukise ekigambo kyammwe oba mukyogere kaati, mazima Ye amanyi bulungi ebiri mu bifuba.
Abaffe, Oyo eyatonda y’atamanyi ng’ate ye Nannyini lumanyo, Ategeera byonna?
Ye y’eyabakolera ensi nga ntereevu, kale mutambulire ku makubo ga yo era mulye ku bigabulwa bye. Era okuzuukira kuli gy’ali.
Abaffe, mulowooza nti muli mirembe kw’Oyo ali mu ggulu nti taabamizise nsi, awo bw’enatandika okukankana?
Nandiki, mulowooza nti muli mirembe kw’Oyo ali mu ggulu nti taabasindikire kibuyaga ow’oluyinjayinja? Kale mangu nnyo mujja kumanya okulabula kwange nga bwe kuli okw’akabi.
Era mazima n’abo abaabakulembera baalimbisa Ababaka, naye ekibonerezo kyange kyali kitya ?
Abaffe, tebalaba ennyonyi eziri waggulu waabwe nga bwe zanjuluza ebiwaawaatiro era nezibiwumba? Tewali azikwatirira wabula Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo. Mazima Ye y’alaba buli kimu.
Abaffe, b’ani abo ab’eggye lyammwe abayinza okubayamba ku Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo? Wabula abatakkiriza tebali ku kirala wabula bali mu kuwubisibwa.
Abaffe, ani oyo anaabagabirira singa Allah anaaziyiza okugabirira kwe? Nedda, bamala gagugubira ku bujeemu na bukyayi.
Abaffe, oyo atambula nga akotese omutwe gwe y’asinga okuba omulung’amu, oba oyo atambula nga yeesimbye mu kkubo eggolokofu?
Gamba nti: Ye y’eyabatonda era n’abakolera amatu n’amaaso n’emitima; naye mwebaza kitono.
Gamba nti: Ye y’eyabayingiwaliza mu nsi, era gy’ali gye mulikung’aanyirizibwa.
Era bagamba nti: Ye okusuubiza kuno kwo kwa ddi, obanga mwogera mazima?
Gamba nti: Ddala okumanya kw’ekyo kuli eri Allah, naye nze ndi Mulabuzi ow’o lwaatu.
Kale bwe balikiraba nga kibindabinda, olwo amaaso g’abatakkiriza galijjula ennaku, era kirigambibwa nti: Kino ky’ekyo kye mwapeekanga.
Gamba nti: Mulabye mutya, singa Allah nze ansanyaawo n’abo abali nange oba n’atusaasira, olwo ani anaataasa abatakkiriza ku kibonerezo ekirumya?
Gamba nti: Oyo nno ye Allah Omusaasizi ennyo ffe gwe tukkiriza era Ye gwe twesiga. Kale mangu nnyo mujja kumanya ani ali mu kubula okw’olwaatu.
Gamba nti: Mulabye mutya, singa amazzi gammwe gabulidde mu ttaka, olwo ate ani anaabaleetera amazzi amayonjo agakulukuta?
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Njuliza akakopo ka bwiino n’ekkalaamu n’ebyo bye bawandiika,
Olw’okusaasira kwa Mukama wo, ddala ggwe toli mugwi wa ddalu.
Era mazima olina empeera etakoma.
Era ddala olina empisa ensukkirivu.
Kale mangu nnyo ojja kulaba era nabo balabe
Ani ku mmwe atawaanyizibwa eddalu.
Mazima Mukama wo y’asinga okumanya oyo abuze ku kkubo lye, era y’asinga okumanya abalung’amu.
Kale togondera abo abalimbisa amazima.
Baagala mbu ogonzeemu eddiini yo olwo nabo balyooke bagonzeemu gy’oli.
Naye togondera buli alayiralayira, omunyoomoofu,
Omuwaayirizi, omutambuza w’olugambo,
Omuziyizi w’ebirungi, omubuusi w’ensalo, omwonoonyi,
Ow’empisa embi, ng’ate awamu n’ekyo n’obuzaale bwe bubuusibwabuusibwa.
Tomugondera wadde ng’alina eby’obugagga n’abaana.
Bw’asomerwa Aya zaffe, agamba nti: Ngero z’abedda!
Tujja kumulamba ku nnyindo.
Mazima tujja kubagezesa nga bwe twagezesa ba nnyini nnimiro awo bwe baalayira nti ddala ebibala baali bateekwa okubikungula ku makya,
Naye ne batajuliza nti: Allah bw’anaaba ayagadde.
Kale akabi okuva eri Mukama wo keetooloola ennimiro nga beebase.
Olwo nebugikeerera nga ering’anga esaayiddwa.
Kale baayiting’ana nga bukya,
Nti: Mukeere nnyo mu nnimiro zammwe, obanga muli ba kukungula.
Kale baagenda bakubagana obwaama.
Nti: Olwa leero temuganya munkuseere yenna kubayingirira mu yo.
Era baakeera nnawankya n’amaanyi ag’ekitalo.
Naye ennimiro bwe baagiraba, baagamba nti: Mazima tubuze bubuzi!
Nedda, wabula tummiddwa okufuna.
Eyali abasingamu obulungi y’eyagamba nti: Abaffe, saabagambye nti: Lwaki temutendereza Allah?
Olwo nebalyooka bagamba nti: Obutuukirivu bwa Mukama waffe. Mazima tubadde bakyaamu.
Olwo baayolekagana bokka na bokka nga banenyagana.
Nebagamba nti: Zitusanze! Mazima tubadde bajeemu.
Ob’olyawo Mukama waffe anatukyuusizaamu ennimiro esinga obulungi kw’eno; mazima kati twolekedde eri Mukama waffe.
Bwe kityo nno ekibonerezo bwe kiba. Naye ddala ekibonerezo ky’enkomerero ky’ekisinga obunene, singa babadde bamanyi.
Mazima abeekuumi balifuna eri Mukama waabwe Janna ez’amasanyu amajjuvu.
Abaffe, tuyise abajeemulukufu ng’abakozi b’ebibi?
Mubadde mutya? Mulamula mutya!
Abaffe, mulinayo ekitabo kye musomamu,
Nti ddala mulikifunamu buli kye mweroboza ?
Nandiki, mulina ekirayiro okuva gye tuli ekitusiba okutuusiza ddala ku lunaku lw’okuzuukira, nti ddala mulifuna buli kye musalawo ?
Babuuze, ani mu bo akyetantala?
Oba balinayo bakatonda abalala, kale baleete bakatonda baabwe, obanga boogera mazima.
Olunaku amazima lwe galibikkulwa, kale balikoowolwa eri okuvuunama, naye nno nga tebakyasobola;
Nga bakotese amaaso gaabwe, nga basaanikiddwa obuswaavu; so nga baakoowoolwanga eri okuvuunama nga bakyali mu ddembe, nebatafaayo.
Kale ggwe ndeka n’abo abalimbisa ekigambo kino ekya Kur’āni. Mpolampola tujja kubawalulira eri okuzikirira okuva we batamanyi.
Era mbawa akaaganya, kuba ddala entegeka yange nnywevu.
Abaffe, obasabye mpeera nti bazitoowererwa bbanja ?
Nandiki, balinayo eby’enkiso bye bawandiika ?
Kale ggwe lindirira kusalawo kwa Mukama wo era toba nga Ow’ekyennyanja bwe yalaajanira Mukama we ng’afa ennaku.
Singa okusaasira okwava eri Mukama we tekwamutuukako, mazima yaalikasukiddwa mu kyererezi ng’eno bw’anenyezebwa.
Naye Mukama we yamulonda n’amufuula omu mu batuukirivu.
Era abo abatakkiriza baali na kumpi kugezaako okukuseereza mbu bakuggye ku kitiibwa kyo n’entunula yaabwe ey’obusungu bwe baawulira Ekijjukiza (Kur’āni); era baagamba nti: Oyo ddala mulalu !
Naye yo Kur’āni si kirala wabula ky’Ekijjukiza eri ensi yonna.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Ekiteekwa okubaawo!
Kiki ekyo ekiteekwa okubaawo?
Era ki ekinaakumanyisa ekyo ekiteekwa okubaawo kye ki?
Aba Thamūda n’aba ‘Ādi baalimbisa ekibonerezo ekiggunda.
Kale aba Thamūda baazikirizibwa na kabenje ak’akabi.
Ate aba ‘Ādi nebazikirizibwa n’omuyaga oguwuluguma, ogw’essungu,
Gwe yabakunsizako okumala ebiro musanvu n’emisana munaana obutasalako, kale ng’olaba mu gwo abantu nga bagudde wansi nga balinga ebikolo by’emitende ebyeyaze wansi.
Abaffe, olabawo ekyasigalawo ku bo?
Era Farāwo n’abo abaamukulembera n’abebibuga ebyavuunikibwa baakolanga nnyo ebibi.
Kale baajeemera Omubaka wa Mukama waabwe, olwo Allah n’abakwatamu olukwata olunyiiga.
Mazima amazzi bwe gaatumbiira, twabasitulira mu kyombo,
Tulyooke tukifuule ekijjukizo gye muli era kikuumibwe okutu okukuuma.
Kale eng’ombe bw’erifuuyibwamu olufuuwa lumu,
N’ensi n’ensozi nebisitulwa nebitetentebwa olubetenta lumu,
Kale kw’olwo ekiteekwa okubaawo lwe kirigwaawo.
N’eggulu liryabikayabika, era kw’olwo liriba liyenjebufu.
Era ba malayika baliba ebbali wa lyo. Ku lunaku olwo waggulu waabwe eribaayo ba malayika munaana nga bawaniridde Nnamulondo ya Mukama wo.
Kw’olwo lwe mulireetebwa eri Allah; tewaliba kyaama kyammwe kyonna kiryekisa.
Kale oyo aliweebwa ekitabo kye mu ddyo we, aligamba nti: Mujje musome ku kitabo kyange!
Mazima nze nali nkakasa nti ddala ndisisinkana n’okubalwa kwange.
Kale oyo y’aliba mu bulamu obwesiimisa,
Mu Janna eya waggulu ennyo,
Ebirimba by’ebibala bya yo biriba kumpi nnyo.
Baligambibwa nti: Mweriire era mwenyweere n’essanyu olw’ebirungi ebyo bye mwakola mu nnaku azaayita.
Naye oyo aliweebwa ekitabo kye mu kkono we, kale aligamba nti: Nga ndabye! Kale singa siweereddwa kitabo kyange!
Ne simanya na kubalwa kwange!
Kale singa okwo okufa kwe nnafa kwe kwali okw’enkomerero, ne ssizuukira!
Obugagga bwange tebungasizza n’akatono.
Obuyinza bwange nabwo bumpeddeko.
Kirigambibwa nti: Mumukwate mumusibe mu njegere,
N’oluvannyuma mumusuule mu muliro.
N’oluvannyuma mumusse mu lujegere, obuwanvu bwa lwo yaadi nsanvu.
Mazima yali takkiriza Allah, Omusukkirivu.
Era nga takubiriza na kuliisa munkuseere,
Kale olwa leero, wano tajja kuba na wa mukwano;
Wadde emmere, okuggyako amazzi aganaazibbwamu amabwa.
Agataliibwa mulala yenna okuggyako aboonoonyi.
Si kyo, njuliza ebyo byonna bye mulabako,
N’ebyo bye mutalabako,
Nti mazima yo Kur’āni ddala ky’ekigambo ekyassibwa ku Mubaka Ow’ekitiibwa.
Era yo si kigambo kya muyiiya wa bitontome; naye mukkiriza katono nnyo !
Ate si kigambo kya mulaguzi; naye mufumiitiriza katono nnyo!
Yo kwe kubikkulirwa okwava eri Omulezi w’ebitonde byonna.
Era singa (Nabbi) yatupaatiikako ebigambo eby’engeri yonna,
Mazima twalimukutte olukwata ne ddyo,
N’oluvannyuma twalimukutuddemu omusuwa gw’obulamu,
Era tewaalibaddewo na yenna mu mmwe eyaalituziyizza ku ye.
Era mazima Kur’āni eno kwe kujjukiza eri abatya Allah.
Era mazima tumanyi nti ddala mu mmwe mulimu abalimbisa Kur’āni.
Naye ddala ekyo kiriba kya kwejjusa eri abatakkiriza.
Era ddala yo ge mazima amakakafu.
Kale tendereza n’erinnya lya Mukama wo Omusukkirivu.
Ku lw’erinnnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Omubuuzi yabuuza ku kibonerezo ekigenda okugwa
Ku batakkiriza, ekitalibaako aziyiza,
Ekiriva eri Allah, Nannyini madaala aga waggulu.
Ba malayika ne Mwoyo balinnya gy’ali mu lunaku olugeraageranyizibwa n’emyaka emitwalo etaano.
Kale gumiikiriza okugumiikiriza okulungi.
Mazima bo bakiraba ng’ekiri ewala,
Naye Ffe tukiraba nga kiri kumpi.
Olunaku eggulu lwe liriba ng’ekikomo ekisaanuuse,
N’ensozi lwe ziriba ng’ebyoya by’endiga,
N’owomukwano talibuuza bifa ku mukwano gwe.
Newaakubadde nga balitunuuliganyizibwa, omwonoonyi alyegomba nti singa yeenunuzza abaana be ku kibonerezo ky’olunaku olwo,
Ne mukyala we ne muganda we,
N’owekika kye eyamuwanga obubudamu,
N’abali mu nsi bonna, n’oluvannyuma ye yeewonye ekibonerezo.
Nedda, ddala kyo nnimi za muliro,
Ogulibambula oluliba lwonna.
Gulikoowoola buli eyakubayo amabega neyekyuusa
N’atuuma eby’obugagga, n’abikwatirira.
Mazima omuntu yatondwa nga mupapi, ate nga mukodo.
Bw’atuukibwako obuzibu, ng’ayaziirana.
Ate bw’atuukwako ebirungi, nga akodowala.
Okuggyako abasaaze.
Abo abasaala essaala zaabwe olubeerera.
N’abo abalina omutemwa omutuufu mu by’obugagga bwabwe,
Ogw’oyo asaba obuyambi n’oyo atesobola, atasaba.
N’abo abakakasa olunaku lw’okulamulirwako,
N’abo abatya ekibonerezo kya Mukama waabwe —
Mazima ekibonerezo kya Mukama waabwe tekitaliza mwonoonyi —
N’abo abakuuma ennyo obweereere bwabwe,
Okuggyako eri bakyala baabwe oba abawambe abali mu mikono gyabwe egya ddyo, kale ddala abo tebanenyezebwa.
Naye abo abanoonya ebiri ebbali w’ebyo, kale abo be babuusi b’ensalo.
N’abo abalabirira ebibasigiddwa n’endagaano zaabwe,
N’abo abeesimbu mu bujulizi bwabwe,
N’abo abakuuma obutiribiri essaala zaabwe,
Abo nno be baliba mu Janna nga baweebwa ebitiibwa.
Ye babadde ki abo abatakkiriza abajja gy’oli ku mbiranye,
Okuva ku ddyo ne ku kkono mu bibinja eby’enjawulo?
Abaffe, buli omu mu bo asuubira nti wa kuyingizibwa mu Janna ey’essanyu erijjuvu?
Nedda! Mazima Ffe twabatonda mw’ekyo kye bamanyi.
Kale ddala njuliza Mukama w’ebuvanjuba n’ebugwanjuba, mazima ddala tulina obuyinza
Okubakyuusaamu abalala ababasinga obulungi, ate Ffe tetulemesebwa.
Kale ggwe baleke baganiire era bazannye okutuusa lwe balisisinkana n’olunaku lwabwe olwo lwe basuubizibwa,
Olunaku lwe balifubutuka okuva mu ntaana nga baling’anga abaddukira eri ekiruubirirwa,
Nga amaaso gaabwe gatunudde wansi era nga basaanikiddwa obuswaavu. Olwo nno lwe lunaku lwe basuubizibwa.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Mazima twatuma Nūḥu eri abantu be nti: Labula abantu bo nga tebannatuukwako kibonerezo ekirumya.
N’agamba nti: Abange, mazima nze ndi Mulabuzi gye muli ow’olwaatu,
Kale musinze Allah era mumutye, era mung’ondere.
Ajja kubasonyiwa ebyonono byammwe era abawe akaagaanya okumala ekiseera ekigere. Mazima entuuko ya Allah bw’etuuka teziyizibwa, singa mubadde mumanyi.
N’agamba nti: Mukama wange, mazima nkoowodde bannange ekiro n’emisana,
Naye okukoowoola kwange tekulina kye kubongedde, okuggyako okudduka.
Era buli lwe nnabakoowola olyooke obasonyiwe, bassanga ennwe zaabwe mu matu gaabwe, nebeebikka n’engoye zaabwe era nebaguguba, nebeekuluntaza olwekuluntaza.
Nate era nnabakoowola eri ekkubo lyo mu lwaatu.
N’oluvannyuma nababuulira mu lujjudde era nenjogera nabo mu kafubo ssemafubo.
Neng’amba nti: Musabe okusonyiyibwa eri Mukama wammwe. Mazima Ye ye Musonyiyi ow’ensusso.
Ajja kubaweereza ebire by’enkuba ennyingi,
Era abongere eby’obugagga n’abaana, era abateerewo ensuku, era abateerewo n’emigga.
Mubadde ki? Lwaki ye Allah temumusubiramu biweesa kitiibwa?
So nga ddala y’eyabatonda mu mitendera.
Abaffe, temulaba nga Allah bwe yatonda emigigi gy’eggulu omusanvu nga giberekaganye?
Era n’assa mu gyo omwezi nga bwe butangaavu, n’akola enjuba nga y’ettaala?
Era Allah y’eyabasibula olusibula okuva mu nsi ng’ebimera.
N’oluvannyuma y’alibazza mu yo, nate y’alibaggya mu yo oluggya olw’enjawulo.
Era Allah y’eyabakolera ensi nga ky’ekyaliiro.
Mulyooke mutambulire ku yo mu makubo ageetadde.
Nūḥu n’agamba nti: Mukama wange, mazima nze banjeemedde, nebgoberera oyo obugagga bwe n’abaana be ebitalina kye bimwongeddeko okuggyako okuzikirira.
Era beekobye olwekoba kasiggu.
Era bagamba nti: Temwabulira ba katonda bammwe, era temuva ku Wadd a* wadde Suwā’* wadde Yaghūtha* wadde Ya‘ūqa* wadde Nasra*.
Era ddala babuzizza bangi; kale toyongera aboononyi, okuggyako okufiirwa.
Olw’ebyonono byabwe baasaanyizibwawo n’amazzi ne buyingizibwa mu muliro era tebaafunayo bayambi ku Allah.
Era Nūḥu yagamba nti: Mukama wange, toleka ku nsi mutuuze yenna mu batakkiriza bano.
Kuba ddala bw’onoobaleka, bajja kubuza bubuza baddu bo era tebajja kuzaala okuggyako aboononefu, abatakkiriza.
Mukama wange, nsonyiwa n’abazadde bange, n’oyo yenna anaayingira mu nju yange nga mukkiriza, n’abakkiriza abasajja n’abakkiriza abakazi; era toyongera aboononyi, okuggyako okuzikirira.
Ku lw’erinnya lya Allah, Omusaasizi ennyo, Ow’ekisa ekingi.
Gamba nti: Mbikkuliddwa nti ddala ekibiina ky’Amajinni kyawuliriza Kur’āni, nebagamba nti: Mazima tuwulidde Kur’āni nga ya kyewuunyo nnyo,
Erung’amya eri ekkubo ettuufu; kale tugikkirizza, era tetukyazzeeyo kwenkanyankanya Mukama waffe ne yenna.
Era tukkiriza nti mu mazima, ekitiibwa kya Mukama waffe kigulumivu nnyo. Tatwalanga mukyala wadde omwana.
Era ddala omusiru mu ffe yayogeranga ku Allah eby’obulimba obusukkirivu.
Era ddala ffe twalowoozanga nti abantu n’Amajinni tebayinza kwogera ku Allah bya bulimba.
Era ddala waaliwo abamu mu bantu aba bulijjo abanoonyanga obukuumi mu bantu b’omu Majinni, kale nebabongera okujagalala,
Era ddala nabo baalowooza, nga mmwe bwe mulowooza, nti ddala Allah talituma nate Mubaka yenna.
Era ddala twagezaako okutuuka ku ggulu, kale netulisanga nga lijjudde abakuumi ab’amaanyi ennyo ne ba kibonoomu.
Era ddala twatuulanga mu lyo ku bituulwako olw’okuwuliriza. Naye kati buli awuliriza, asanga nga kibonoomu amuteeze.
Era ddala ffe tetumanyi oba abali mu nsi baagalizibwa bibi oba Mukama waabwe abaagaliza bulung’amu.
Era ddala mu ffe mulimu abakozi b’ebirungi ne mu ffe mulimu abatali batyo; tuli bibiina ebigoberera endowooza ez’enjawulo.
Era ddala ffe tukakasa nti tetuyinza kufuggaza ntegeka ya Allah ku nsi era tetuyinza kumulemesa olw’okudduka.
Era mazima bwe twawulira obulung’amu, twabukkiriza. Kale oyo akkiritiza mu Mukama we, tatya nti alifiirwa wadde okulyazaamanyizibwa.
Era ddala mu ffe mulimu abajeemulukufu eri Allah ne mu ffe mulimu abaawaba. Naye abo abaajeemulukuka, kale be baanoonya ekkubo ettuufu.
Naye abo abaawaba, kale abo z’enku z’omuliro.
